programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the long-running words-and-numbers game, with Dr Phil Hammond joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug arranges a reunion with all his old footballing buddies, but the occasion turns sour when his sporting achievements are overlooked in favour of someone else's. Comedy, starring Kevin James.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: During a spell of bad weather, Arthur moves into the room next door to Doug and Carrie's. Family comedy, starring Kevin James.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie repeatedly cheats to beat Deacon and Kelly at games, causing Arthur to reveal a traumatic story from her childhood.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert finally decides to propose to Amy and persuades Ray to accompany him to meet her parents - who prove far from amenable to the idea. Comedy, starring Monica Horan, Brad Garrett and Ray Romano.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra urges Ray to be firmer with the twins, but his heavy-handed approach to discipline soon has her backtracking. Ray Romano stars.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Maris murder case makes Niles a celebrity, but it's not long before a jealous Frasier seizes the chance to regain his place in the spotlight. Meanwhile, Roz's arrogant sister Denise gets her comeuppance. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: KACL staff compete against a rival station in a weight-loss challenge. Frasier refuses to participate, but Roz offers herself as part of the prize. Meanwhile, Niles struggles to cope with the sleepless nights caused by an unusual symptom of Daphne's pregnancy.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jane Grote Abell, the Chairwoman of Donatos Pizza and daughter of the company's founder, poses as a contestant on a reality TV show who is trying to win money to open her own restaurant. Her aim is to uncover where the company is going, what plans for the future should include and whether her father's values are still being upheld.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three previous restaurants he tried to save - Handlebar, Casa Roma and the Black Pearl - to find out whether his advice has been put to good use.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Vet on the Hill
programme.desc: Scott Miller puts himself in the firing line treating an aggressive Rottweiler, a much-loved spaniel may have an incurable disease, and a cat is brought in with a fractured tail.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: A teenage girl passes through the doors of Prestige Pawnbrokers, seeking to sell her grandfather's designer watch in an effort to fund her fledgling jewellery business. History expert Lawrence is delighted when he is presented with an autographed 1960s racing programme, and an online customer is shocked by the valuation received by her collection of luxury items. Plus, boss James Constantinou ends up crashing a converted double-decker bus when he takes it for a test drive.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, with guest Dr Phil Hammond alongside Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: Fifteen to One
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig hosts the general knowledge quiz in which 15 contestants try to win a place in the end-of-series final, when a £40,000 jackpot will be up for grabs.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: Ian and Jane Crang from West Sussex search for a family home in Almeria in Spain, while Damian from Belfast looks for an apartment in Alicante on the Costa Blanca.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The cooking contest moves to South Yorkshire, where the first pair present a Michael Jackson-inspired menu, followed by evenings hosted by Sam and Rosie, and Ian and Lorraine.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer, Moe and Lenny go in pursuit of Carl when he skips town with $200,000 in winnings from a lottery ticket he bought with them. However, their search makes them realise how little they know about their friend and almost reaches a dead-end until Lisa points them in the direction of Iceland. Featuring music by Sigur Ros.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Scott's mum turns up at Diane and Tony's flat which panics Diane. Scott's behaviour begins to change once he arrives, but is he up to something? Meanwhile, The Nightingales' are getting ready for the big relaunch at The Dog, and Leela has a new suspicion about her stalker.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Hidden Restaurants with Michel Roux Jr
programme.desc: Michel's journey brings him to the West Country and Wales, as he searches for secret eateries and food mavericks in remote and often bizarre places. On his travels he discovers hidden restaurants inside a garden shed, a staff canteen and a Victorian walled kitchen garden, before visiting a highly-celebrated crab shack. Later, Michel travels to London with his friend and chef Freddy Bird, and the pair meet a couple who want to turn an old barge into a fine-dining fish restaurant on the Isles of Scilly.(n)

programme.title: The Royal House of Windsor
programme.desc: The fifth installment of the series focuses on the life and tragic death of Diana, Princess of Wales. Her huge personality and celebrity status challenged the Windsors, culminating in the famous 1995 Panorama interview that prompted the Queen to demand Prince Charles to divorce Diana. After her tragic death, the House of Windsor was shaken, but she left an enduring legacy in the form of her two sons.(n)

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: The challenges faced by emergency services on the roads, revealing how new technology can detect people driving under the influence of drugs, leading to a rise in convictions. A woman is found to be over the limit while driving only a few streets away from her home. Emergency services personnel reveal the problems they have when dealing with elderly motorists who may no longer be able to drive safely, and how responding to an incident can have lasting repercussions.(n)

programme.title: Lee Mack: Hit the Road Mack
programme.desc: Filmed at London's Hammersmith Apollo, this documentary showcases the multi award-winning star at the top of his game, in a performance that soon has his audience roaring with laughter. Lee's trademark humour of well-created gags and sharp one-liners are plentiful as he muses on the perils of everyday life, while sharing plenty of fun, quips and banter with the audience.(n)

programme.title: Mutiny
programme.desc: Nine men recreate a voyage by William Bligh in 1789, when he and his loyal crewmen crossed 4,000 miles of the Pacific ocean from Tonga to Timor after being cast adrift from HMS Bounty by mutinying officers and left for dead. SAS: Who Dares Wins chief instructor Anthony Middleton is in charge of a crew of eight made up of sailors and complete novices, attempting the journey in a replica 23ft open wooden boat, with similar equipment and the same rations of food and water that Bligh's men had.(n)

programme.title: Love & Other Drugs
programme.desc: A cynical sales rep for a pharmaceutical company applies the charm he uses on his customers to the task of seducing a succession of women. He starts a purely sexual relationship with a waitress, who has Parkinson's disease and is even less interested in commitment than he is, only to find himself falling in love. Romantic comedy drama based on Jamie Reidy's book Hard Sell: The Evolution of a Viagra Salesman, starring Jake Gyllenhaal and Anne Hathaway.(n)

programme.title: Dispatches
programme.desc: Seyi Rhodes investigates the impact of the government's latest benefit cap, which was intended to make sure that work paid more than benefits. He meets some of the families affected by it and discovers that, while some people are now changing their lifestyles, the cap's unintended consequences may mean pushing the benefits bill up in other ways.(n)

programme.title: Unreported World
programme.desc: Animal trafficking has seen an unprecedented spike in recent years, threatening dozens of species with extinction. Reporter Ade Adepitan travels to the remote city of Iquitos, Peru, where undercover filming reveals the scale and brazen nature of backstreet dealers and market traders selling protected wildlife for bush meat and the international trade - both illegal practices, yet seemingly ignored by the local police.(n)

programme.title: Building the Dream
programme.desc: Charlie Luxton comes to the aid of first-time self-builders Howard Lawrenson and Kevin Taylor, who are trying to build a bungalow on a plot overlooking a park in Bolton.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the third night of the competition in Boston, Lincolnshire, Adrian hopes that his spicy food and surprises will help him scoop the £1,000 prize. Although he was quiet at the table the previous night, Adrian goes on the charm offensive and seems to be impressing his guests - but he may have gone a step too far with his final revelation.(n)

programme.title: Fifteen to One
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig hosts the general knowledge quiz in which 15 contestants try to win a place in the end-of-series final, when a £40,000 jackpot will be up for grabs.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, with guest Dr Phil Hammond alongside Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie reminisces about meeting Doug, recalling how she was originally paired off with Richie, while he was with her friend Lynn. Donny Osmond guest stars, with Kevin James and Leah Remini.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug and Carrie make new friends, but a scheduling error means they have to choose between going out with some old pals or their new acquaintances.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: After being bombarded with subtle hints, Carrie throws a surprise party to celebrate Arthur's 75th birthday, roping in a reluctant Doug to take the old man out for the day. However, when the pair visit Arthur's favourite restaurant for lunch, he slopes off.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray reluctantly agrees to do charity work at a hospital, but proves so popular with the patients that he starts spending more time with them than at home - much to wife Debra's dismay. Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton star.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Amy's mother and father turn up unexpectedly, intending to take their daughter back home with them. They are less than happy to find Ray there, let alone his parents, and the atmosphere is tense as the families take an instant dislike to each other.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Ann Who Came to Dinner.
programme.desc: Maris is released on bail and placed under house arrest, only to embroil an unwitting Niles in a madcap scheme to flee the country. Meanwhile, Frasier is forced to take care of Roz's insurance agent Ann. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, David Hyde Pierce and Julia Sweeney.(n)

programme.title: Frasier

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples compete in East Sussex. The food includes burgers followed by jelly, and a traditional Ghanaian menu, leaving the third pair confident they have it in the bag.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge is feeling neglected by Homer, and the timing couldn't be worse as their 10th wedding anniversary is fast approaching. Little does she know her husband is planning a grand romantic gesture inspired by a special moment from their first year of marriage. But wires get crossed when the miffed housewife stumbles upon a dodgy website for couples bored of their partners, and she ends up chatting to the too-good-to-be-true Ben (voiced by Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane).(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Drama following the lives and loves of a group of teenagers and young adults in Chester.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Great British Buildings: Restoration of the Year
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud and Anna Keay visit some of the UK's most successful restorations of historic buildings, all of which have been placed on the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors' long list for their Restoration of the Year award. At the end of the programme, Kevin and Anna are joined by historic building surveyor Marianne Suhr and architectural historian Jonathan Foyle to decide which buildings should make the final shortlist. First up are a watermill brought back to life in Cambridgeshire, a seaside villa in Lyme Regis, a Georgian innovation in Northumberland, and a rescued castle in Ceredigion.(n)

programme.title: Three Wives, One Husband
programme.desc: Documentary providing access to the community of Rockland Ranch in the middle of the Utah desert, where 14 Mormon families have made a home for themselves. Half the men here are polygamists, including father-of-16 Enoch Foster. He is one of the most influential men in the community and has two wives, who adore him and each other. But their family is set to expand again, with baby number 17 on the way - and Enoch is also courting a third wife, 25-year-old nanny Lydia.(n)

programme.title: Syria's Disappeared: The Case Against Assad
programme.desc: Documentary investigating how tens of thousands of men, women and children have been disappeared by the Assad regime into a network of clandestine detention centres. Using the testimonies of three survivors and evidence smuggled out of Syria, the film follows victims, family members and international war crimes investigators as they campaign for the release of the disappeared and fight to bring the perpetrators to justice.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Twenty-year-old Antonio is rushed to A&E after a motorcycle accident leaves him with a severe fracture to his leg and the medical team are concerned about a potential arterial bleed. Meanwhile, doctors investigate the damage to the chest and lungs of 40-year-old Karen, who fell off her horse, which then trampled on her, while leukaemia patient Hayley, 29, comes to St George's with wife Emma after suffering an infection and low immune system.(n)

Fran and Danny's dream of buying a burger van is within reach, although the cost will put a significant dent in their budget, so they turn to welfare expert Lee Healey for advice. There are no let-ups, no lie-ins and no luxury as the pair are forced to forage for food in the oppressively humid conditions with only the most basic of living conditions provided.(n)

Meanwhile, Brian and Del chase £3,000 owed to a firm of letting agents, before tracking a debtor who was accidentally over-paid for a job. Plus, Stewart and Iain face an eviction that is set to test their patience.(n)

programme.desc: American social worker Sarah Goode is taken hostage by militants in northern Syria, and thanks to the efforts of the Navy Seals, is eventually returned home unharmed. Evidence from the incident suggests US citizen Kyle Nasry was connected to the kidnapping, but when the agents trace Nasry to a rally held by a controversial imam, they are surprised to find Sarah among the attendees. Meanwhile, DiNozzo finally takes his relationship with Zoe Keates public - surprising none of his colleagues. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.desc: Premiere. A National Guard solder returns from the frontline in Iraq and struggles to return to a normal life. To make matters worse, she finds herself blamed for a friendly fire incident in which two Americans were killed - and then she becomes the target of an obsessed fellow soldier seeking revenge for their deaths. Thriller, starring Roxanne McGee.(n)

Elsewhere, Jim Woolerton and Jason Baxter catch out a rookie rider who is breaking the law.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits and 40 Grand in Debt.
programme.desc: New series. Documentary telling the stories of people struggling to live on state welfare, focusing on some who have found themselves in serious debt.(n)

programme.title: The Last Days of George Michael
programme.desc: Documentary charting the days leading up to the shocking death of singer George Michael on Christmas Day 2016, leading to an outpouring of grief from friends and fans alike.(n)

programme.title: Extraordinary People
programme.sub-title: The Snake Skin Woman: Extraordinary People.
programme.desc: The return of the documentary telling remarkable tales of human experience from around the world, beginning with a woman who lives with a rare skin condition. Nusrit `Nelly' Shaheen from Coventry is the oldest known survivor of Harlequin Ichthyosis, which causes the skin to grow 10 times faster than normal. As a result, her skin cracks and appears scaly, and she spends four hours every day scrubbing off layers of dead skin. The film follows Nelly as she goes about her daily routines and as she meets others sufferers, as well as her desperate search for treatment to alleviate her symptoms.(n)

programme.title: Shannon Matthews: What Happened Next
programme.desc: The disappearance of Shannon Matthews was a story that gripped and then appalled Britain. Nine years on, this documentary examines her kidnapping and why people close to the case believe the police should reopen their investigation. Featuring the insight of some of those closest to the case, the programme charts the impact on an innocent girl caught in the lies and greed of those who were supposed to be caring for her.(n)

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton has a blast as the foul-mouthed safecracker who dresses up as a department store Santa, then robs the joint. Wickedly funny comedy. Strong language/sex(n)

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Tongue-in-cheek horror tale in which a small Nevada desert town is terrorised by giant man-eating worms. Two handymen are forced to postpone their plans to escape their humdrum lives after several mysterious deaths and a series of earthquakes turn out to be the work of predatory subterranean creatures which lay siege to the terrified townsfolk(n)

programme.title: Off-Air
programme.desc: Off-Air(n)

programme.title: The Arrival
programme.desc: Astronomer Zane discovers an alien radio signal and when he tries to report it he unearths a sinister conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Thirteen

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: During a family camping trip at the Grand Canyon, a young boy (David Mazouz) stumbles upon an ancient Native American burial ground. He takes five sacred stones from there back to his suburban home, unaware that they contain a malevolent supernatural force. This tale of terror was directed by Wolf Creek's Greg McLean. Kevin Bacon, Radha Mitchell, and Lucy Fry star in a Blumhouse Productions film(n)

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: George Clooney is a hardened lawyer taking over a sinister case that sent his colleague over the edge. Thriller with an Oscar-winning Tilda Swinton. Strong language(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt takes on a renegade spy who's stolen a deadly high-tech virus(n)

programme.title: Body of Lies
programme.desc: Fresh off of their success with director Martin Scorsese's The Departed, star Leonardo DiCaprio and screenwriter William Monahan team with director Ridley Scott for this screen adaptation of David Ignatius' novel Body of Lies. When CIA operative Roger Ferris (DiCaprio) uncovers evidence indicating that a major terrorist leader may be operating out of Jordan, he enlists the aid of CIA veteran Ed Hoffman (Russell Crowe) in infiltrating the elusive saboteur's vast underground network. During the course of his dangerous mission, Ferris gradually comes to question how much he can trust his presumed allies -- who include not just Hoffman, but the outwardly helpful head of Jordanian intelligence as well(n)

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: A young woman must protect her brother from a terrifying apparition that only manifests in total darkness. Later, she realizes that this fearsome entity is connected to her mentally ill mother, who has started hallucinating conversations with a mysterious figure named Diana(n)

programme.title: Tremors II: Aftershocks
programme.desc: The desert-dwelling giant worms (aka 'graboids') return to terrorise an oil field in Mexico. Earl, a survivor of their first attack, is enlisted to stop them, but finds that their offspring are even more vicious. Tongue-in-cheek horror sequel(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: News of the death of air ace Rafe reaches his sweetheart, who starts to fall for his best pal. Rafe shows up alive in Hawaii, but the trio's problems look miniscule in comparison to the devastation wreaked by the Japanese on Pearl Harbor. Romance set against a blockbuster backdrop with the biggest budget ever footed by a single studio. Explosive(n)

programme.title: Dragon Blade
programme.desc: Roman leader Tiberius (Adrien Brody) is intent on conquering the Silk Road region with his rogue army and it's up to an unlikely alliance between Roman general Lucius (John Cusack) and Chinese warrior Huo An (Jackie Chan) to gather the soldiers of 36 nations together to defeat him(n)

programme.title: According to Spencer
programme.desc: Jesse Bradford and Mia Kirshner star in this cheerful comedy about chance meetings. Spencer (Bradford) gets a job as a clerk at an ad agency, then is delighted to learn that an old crush (Kirshner) works there as well. One question remains: Will she find him as irresistable? David Krumholtz, Brad Rowe, Florence Stanley, Marissa Ribisi(n)

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: A biography of of Scottish playwright JM Barrie, whose relationship with a young widow and her sons inspired the children's classic "Peter Pan"(n)

programme.title: The Pianist
programme.desc: A pianist in Warsaw is thrown out of a job when the Nazis invade. He hides in the ruined city, dodging the squads who carry off Jews to the death camps(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Benjamin Franklin Gates (Nicolas Cage) descends from a family of treasure-seekers who have shared an unusual quest. As Gates-family legend has it, George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, and Benjamin Franklin hid a massive cache of gold during the waning days of the Revolutionary War. Ben's close to discovering its whereabouts, but the FBI and his competition are also hip to the hunt(n)

programme.title: Harold & Kumar Escape From Guantanamo Bay
programme.desc: Kal Penn and John Cho return in this outrageous sequel. The pot-smoking slacker pals are suspected of being terrorists---and have more irreverent misadventures with Neil Patrick Harris. Rob Corddry, Roger Bart, David Krumholtz, Eddie Kaye Thomas. Written and directed by Jon Hurwitz and Hayden Schlossberg(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of professional climbers successfully scale Mount Everest only to be faced with tragedy when a monster storm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent. Jake Gyllenhaal, Josh Brolin, Jason Clarke, and John Hawkes co-star. Directed by Baltasar Kormakur (2 Guns)(n)

programme.title: Pale Rider
programme.desc: A preacher rides to the aid of a village struggling to survive the harsh rule of a mining baron(n)

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Paranormal investigator Hellboy returns to prevent an ancient prince of the underworld from unleashing an army of deadly mechanical monsters and taking over the Earth(n)

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: An American family living in India are devastated when their son is killed in an accident. The wife soon performs a Hindu ritual to speak to the dead, but her actions cause her family to be haunted by an otherworldly force in this chilling horror film(n)

programme.title: Constantine

When CIA operative Roger Ferris (DiCaprio) uncovers evidence indicating that a major terrorist leader may be operating out of Jordan, he enlists the aid of CIA veteran Ed Hoffman (Russell Crowe) in infiltrating the elusive saboteur's vast underground network. During the course of his dangerous mission, Ferris gradually comes to question how much he can trust his presumed allies -- who include not just Hoffman, but the outwardly helpful head of Jordanian intelligence as well(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The men launch a major effort to disassemble the Langley base before the ice melts. Eventually her cover is blown by a member of the gang as the Sun Hill detectives close in for a sting operation, and Stuart is left questioning his colleague's loyalties when she whisks Towler away on her motorbike and disappears without trace. Continues on Monday.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.sub-title: Too Hot to Handle - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of three. The evidence against undercover cop Stevie mounts up, suggesting she has thrown away her career for the love of a villain. Stuart finally catches up with the pair, and his suspicions are confirmed when she turns a gun on her colleague and makes her escape. With the violent Tameside Crew wreaking carnage across Sun Hill in pursuit of Towler, Stuart is suspended from duty for being too close to the case. Concludes tomorrow.(n)

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: The team re-examines the murder of a junior doctor strangled in 2010. programme.title: The Goldbergs

Problems ensue when Lainey and Barry convince Murray to watch American football with Lainey's father. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica and Barry buy a shabby second-hand van to get back at Murray, while Adam objects when he is voted `nicest guy' in the school yearbook and ends up being suspended.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang goes to a bar and runs into Penny's old boyfriend Zack, while Bernadette is left to spend the evening with Sheldon when she cannot go wine tasting with the others. Elsewhere, things do not go to plan when Raj introduces his new girlfriend, Claire. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon discovers a surprise screening of The Avengers is scheduled at a local cinema, complete with a Q&A session with the film's director, Joss Whedon. However, the event just happens to clash with time he'd planned to spend with Amy, so he decides to pay Stuart to be his subtitute for the afternoon while he and the other boys immerse themselves in Marvel superheroics. Meanwhile, Leonard's mother Beverly arrives in town for an extended visit, and Penny takes the opportunity to bond with her new mother-in-law - and to make up for not inviting her to the wedding. Comedy, guest starring Christine Baranski.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Drama following the lives and loves of a group of teenagers and young adults in Chester.(n)

programme.title: Game of Clones
programme.desc: Tom and his custom-made ladies get physical with a rock climbing date, before relaxing with a revealing cocktail night.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: There is a clash of personalities when Sheldon and Leonard's mothers finally meet, while Howard finally decides to do his fair share of the housework - but not without a little help from his friends. Guest starring Christine Baranski and Laurie Metcalf.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Howard send Sheldon on a train journey to keep him away from their Air Force project - but the plan backfires. Bernadette has her first night out since having the baby.(n)

programme.title: Timeless

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends try to solve the mystery of Sheldon's post-lunch activities, following him to a secret room where they discover how he chills out. Elsewhere, Leonard is jealous when Penny starts texting a classmate, but things quickly change when Alex gets flirty with him.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon feels undermined when his parking space at the university is allocated to Howard instead, and his determination to cling on to the spot causes a rift in the pair's friendship. However, the battle between the boys pales in comparison to that waged by Amy and Bernadette, whose disagreement on behalf of their significant others becomes increasingly personal. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: First through the doors is Frankie, who is tired of being hurt by the wrong kind of guy. Her blind date is fellow dancer Muhala, who is overjoyed to be matched with someone who shares his passion. Trainee midwife Kate could be in luck when she finds a kindred spirit in paramedic Liam, while eternal romantic Tim, who has grown bored with online dating, tries to charm Jenny into meeting him again.(n)

programme.title: Celebs Go Dating
programme.desc: Charlotte has a good first date with fish factory worker Brad, while Joey Essex is the matchmaker's star pupil, but it remains to be seen whether he will get a kiss from Becky.(n)

programme.title: Timeless

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Audrey attempts to bond with her unborn baby by reading stories, but makes Jeff paranoid she is trying to form an alliance against him. Meanwhile, Russell gets his comeuppance for plagiarising a property development article written by Timmy. Comedy, starring David Spade, Megyn Price and Patrick Warburton.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Brenda enlists Jeff and Audrey's help when she does the catering for an event at Columbia University, but it seems the guests are more impressed with Jeff's bartending skills than his wife's waitressing. Meanwhile, Timmy's parents pay a visit, and worried Russell will embarrass him, he decides not to invite him out to dinner with them. Comedy, with Patrick Warburton and David Spade.(n)

programme.title: The Mindy Project
programme.sub-title: How to Lose a Mom in Ten Days.
programme.desc: Mindy sets Danny's mum up on a blind date, leading to a crazy and unexpected sequence of events that see her mother-in-law falling head over heels in love. Rhea Perlman guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe frees a genie from a bottle, but discovers she must take its place. Chris tries desperately to get Leo and Piper back together, while Richard becomes corrupted by magic, jeopardising his relationship with Paige. Supernatural drama, starring Alyssa Milano.(n)

programme.title: Suburgatory
programme.desc: Tessa is hesitant about supporting Lisa when she confides in her that she has decided to propose to Malik, but the plan does not work out as expected. However, Tessa is inspired to fight for her ex-boyfriend Ryan's attention. Meanwhile, George is concerned when he hears his girlfriend Nora being rude to her employees. Comedy, starring Jeremy Sisto and Jane Levy.(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Darklighters send Leo and Piper to the ghostly plane by mistake, while Gideon tries to make a deal with them, and Chris begins to disappear. Supernatural drama, starring Rose McGowan, Holly Marie Combs and Alyssa Milano.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: Brendan is still shell-shocked by last night's vote, until his day is brightened by the arrival of some new tourists - as well as some action-packed fun on the water.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Scott's mum turns up at Diane and Tony's flat which panics Diane. Scott's behaviour begins to change once he arrives, but is he up to something? Meanwhile, The Nightingales' are getting ready for the big relaunch at The Dog, and Leela has a new suspicion about her stalker.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey enrol in a cookery class, already attended by Adam and Jen, as a way of spending more time together. However, things soon get competitive between the two couples. Meanwhile, Timmy is disturbed when he realises he has a lot of things in common with Russell's new girlfriend. Comedy, with Patrick Warburton and David Spade.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Jeff invites his old college friend Heidi round to show Audrey that she does not have romantic feelings for him, but the plan backfires when she makes a shocking confession. Meanwhile, Adam designs a test to help him choose his best man, and Timmy announces he is leaving Russell's employment.(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: A break-in inspires Mike to install a security system - but Vanessa goes one step further and organises a neighbourhood watch scheme. American comedy, starring Tim Allen.(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike imposes a new set of rules in the Baxter household - but his attempts to promote discipline only create conflict between him and the girls.(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe attends a high-school reunion and accidentally casts a spell turning her back into her rebellious teenage self, while Piper enlists her father's help to discover why Chris has started to avoid her. Supernatural drama, starring Holly Marie Combs and Alyssa Milano.(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A heavily pregnant Piper is attacked by a spider demon, which also infects Chris. Meanwhile, Leo tries to become a full-time Elder - but he still does not know he is the father of Piper's unborn child. Supernatural drama, starring Holly Marie Combs.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: The friends prepare for their annual Halloween party - which for Ted means another fruitless search for the girl he met at the event several years earlier, but has never seen since. Marshall and Lily enter a costume competition, and Robin introduces everyone to her new boyfriend, Mike.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted visits a matchmaker with a 100 per cent success record, but the only woman she can find who is compatible with him is already in a relationship. Lily and Marshall's apartment is invaded by a strange creature. Sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam accidentally gets Barry kicked out of his cool group of friends, so he comes up with a plan to get his brother back in favour by convincing them he has the hacking skills to access the school's computer system to change their grades. Comedy, starring Sean Giambrone.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Pops is evicted after accidentally starting a fire in his flat during a Halloween party. Beverly invites him to move into the family home, but soon his wild lifestyle proves too much for them to handle. Comedy, starring George Segal.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon's grandmother, known as Meemaw, arrives in Pasadena to visit, but his excitement at her arrival quickly gives way to discomfort when she clashes with Amy. Meanwhile, Raj finds himself drawn to an ambitious female screenwriter he meets at the comic-book store, but Bernadette angrily reminds him he already has a girlfriend. Comedy, guest starring June Squibb.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy host a Valentine's Day episode of Fun with Flags, while Leonard and Penny grapple with getting older. Elsewhere, Howard and Bernadette discover a surprise in their hot tub, and Raj is torn between Emily and a girl he met at the Comic Bookstore. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall does work experience at Barney's company, where his personality changes for the worse as he struggles to conform. Meanwhile, Ted is bombarded with gifts from Victoria, but feels guilty for not sending her anything in return. US comedy, with Josh Radnor, Alyson Hannigan and Neil Patrick Harris.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: A lonely Robin invites Ted to her flat, placing him in a predicament as he awaits a phone call from Victoria, convinced it is time to put an end to their long-distance relationship. Josh Radnor and Colbie Smulders star.(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike relives his adventurous youth, and Vanessa reminisces about life before she became a mother. Comedy, starring Tim Allen.(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Ed seeks Mike's advice as he prepares to make a decision, and the girls introduce Bud to the world of internet dating. Comedy, starring Tim Allen and Robert Foster.(n)

programme.desc: Inspired by the film Ferris Bueller's Day Off, Barry pretends to be ill so that he can avoid school and create an epic day of his own. However, his plans go awry when Adam has exactly the same idea. Charlie Sheen guest stars.(n)

programme.desc: Dana and Adam are given a doll to parent for a class assignment, but find their project compromised when Beverly interferes. Erica tries to get her own back on Barry when he takes up all her best friend Lainey's time.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.desc: Pilot episode of the comedy about high-achieving scientists and their friendship with a down-to-earth neighbour. programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: As part of the relationship agreement, Sheldon reluctantly has to take care of Amy when she gets sick, but she loves the extra attention so much she pretends to remain in poor health. programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Nigel Marven's Giant Rhino Adventure
programme.desc: The presenter sets off on a journey around the world, meeting the conservationists who dedicate their lives to saving the animal from extinction.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: The scientific story behind the moment the first stars appeared in the universe, known as the Cosmic Dawn, which transformed the dark world originally created by the Big Bang. Astronomers now have the tools to explore this dramatic event that created the first ingredients of life as we know it, when the first stars were born to light up the universe. With contributions by Professor Tom Abel, Professor Volker Bromm, Charmaine Green and Margaret Whitehurst.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Machine
programme.desc: A 2008 documentary in which Professor Brian Cox visits Geneva to look around Cern's Large Hadron Collider - the world's most powerful particle collider - before the apparatus goes live. He explains why some scientists believe the experiment will be able to recreate the conditions that existed a billionth of a second after the Big Bang, and reveal some of the mysteries of creation.(n)

programme.title: Wonders of the Monsoon
programme.desc: The other side of the monsoon, as the winds bring dry air and drought. Budgerigars swarm in the Australian desert, gathering at a precious waterhole, and although birds of prey try to ambush them, they are mesmerised by the array of bright colours on show. On the island of Borneo, a bearded pig hunts for seafood on the beach, while in the Rajasthan desert, nomads haggle over the price of camels, which can provide vital transport during this lean season. The mugger crocodiles of Sri Lanka stalk the animals taking a much-needed drink and a young leopard learning to hunt discovers there is no such thing as an easy meal. Colin Salmon narrates.(n)

programme.title: Nigel Marven's Giant Rhino Adventure
programme.desc: The presenter sets off on a journey around the world, meeting the conservationists who dedicate their lives to saving the animal from extinction.(n)

programme.title: India's New Worlds
programme.desc: Part one of two. Documentary charting wildlife conservation projects in India, including efforts to avert the extinction of the Asiatic lion.(n)

programme.desc: David Attenborough explores the possibility that plants and insects hold the key to the origins of life, and explains how early creatures made the move to becoming land-dwellers.(n)

programme.title: China's 10 Deadliest Snakes with Nigel Marven
programme.desc: The wildlife presenter, author and ornithologist travels to the Far East for a closer look at China's deadliest snakes.(n)

programme.title: Finding Life Beyond Earth
programme.desc: Part one of two. Recent telescope images are combined with CGI technology to illustrate the sights and sounds of alien worlds. Powerful modern telescopes and unmanned space missions have revealed a wide range of dynamic environments, prompting scientists to expand their ideas about the possibility that life may be present elsewhere in the solar system.(n)

programme.title: The Saturn V Story
programme.desc: Documentary following the `space race' of the 1960s, focusing on the USA's multi-billion dollar space program. Featuring Nasa footage, visual effects and interviews with Apollo scientists to construct a timeline of President Kennedy's 1961 pledge to put a man on the moon by the end of the decade, and the reality of 24 individuals successfully making the journey in the Saturn V rocket.(n)

programme.title: Wonders of the Monsoon
programme.desc: Documentary examining the plants and animals that thrive in monsoon areas, narrated by Colin Salmon. Crested black macaques take advantage of an abundance of fruit, and maleo birds use the sun to incubate their eggs on the Indonesian island of Sulawesi. On Java, locals climb volcanoes to offer live sacrifices in thanks for the peaks' help in precipitating rain and fertilising plants with ash. The frequent and heavy rains in Borneo have destroyed the soils, created fierce competition for scarce nutrients, and driven evolution to produce some curious creatures. The Rajah Brooke's pitcher encourages tree shrews to relieve themselves to obtain the substances it needs, while the Bornean red leech is capable of swallowing the giant blue earthworm in one gulp.(n)

programme.title: China's 10 Deadliest Snakes with Nigel Marven
programme.desc: The wildlife presenter, author and ornithologist travels to the Far East for a closer look at China's deadliest snakes.(n)

programme.title: India's New Worlds
programme.desc: Concluding part of the documentary charting some of the many wildlife conservation projects currently being pursued in India.(n)

programme.title: Life on Earth
programme.desc: Broadcaster David Attenborough explains the development of creatures with spinal columns, such as mammals, birds, reptiles, amphibians and fish.(n)

programme.desc: Meg Ryan stars in this action thriller as Captain Karen Walden, one of the US military's bravest officials. Recently killed in action, Captain Walden has been nominated for a Medal of Honour in recognition for her services, but an investigation into the circumstances surrounding her death has yet to be completed. Lieutenant Colonel Nathaniel Serling (Denzel Washington) is charged with looking into Walden's behaviour in the line of duty and assessing whether she really did display courage under fire(n)

programme.title: Dr. Wai: The Scripture With No Words
programme.desc: This comedy is quite a change for Hong Kong martial arts hero Jet Li. Li plays Chow, the writer of a pulp-style adventure serial, who seems to be failing in both his career and his marriage to Monica (Rosamund Kwan). The film also enacts out Chow's story as he writes it: Li also plays the fictional Dr. Wai, a daring adventurer in the tradition of Doc Savage or Indiana Jones. As Chow tries to churn out his story, Dr. Wai pursues a mysterious scroll called "The Scripture Without Words"; the film's transitions between reality and fantasy is reminiscent of films such as Brazil and The Princess Bride(n)

programme.title: The Detonator
programme.desc: The CIA assigns an undercover agent on a perilous mission to escort a Russian informant from Poland to New York. The danger lies in a sinister cartel of Romanian gun-runners, which is targeting the woman and scheming to acquire a nuclear bomb(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A radical becomes the chief suspect when Nichols and Eames look into the case of a Wall Street executive murdered during a kidnap attempt. The detectives believe the group responsible is modelled after 1970s German militants the Red Army Faction, and must hurry to uncover their identities before they strike again. Crime drama, starring Jeff Goldblum.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the rest of the CBI team investigate when the owner of a dilapidated Wild West tourist town is murdered. Meanwhile, Kirkland is busy trying to find out how much Jane knows about Red John. Is the Homeland Security agent in league with the serial killer?.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and the team investigate the mysterious death of a woman who received relationship advice from a radio-show host, and Rigsby and Van Pelt go undercover as a troubled couple in the hope of finding a lead. Crime drama, starring Owain Yeoman and Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A bungled diamond robbery leaves three innocent bystanders dead, prompting the team to embark on a desperate hunt for the killers - but another slaying is soon discovered, apparently perpetrated by the Mob. Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate the deaths of a museum curator and an art authenticator. Initial evidence points to a murder and suicide, but a fake Monet masterpiece discovered in the studio helps expose a lucrative racket involving priceless forged paintings believed to have been sunk in a Nazi U-boat in 1945. Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While on medical leave, Ducky reopens a 12-year-old case by talking officials at a cemetery into releasing the body of a navy commander whose post-mortem he carried out 12 years previously. Meanwhile, the team is called in to investigate the death of a sergeant from carbon monoxide poisoning - and finds a copy of Ducky's exhumation request on the man's laptop. Crime drama, starring David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when three dehydrated survivors from a helicopter crash are discovered. The pilot is initially missing, but his body later washes ashore with a gunshot wound to the head. Things get complicated when one of the crew members tells the agents the chopper was hit by another aircraft, while another states that the pilot tried to kill them all by crashing into the sea on purpose. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: When JJ LaRoche's house is robbed, he personally requests Jane's help with the case. The former head of CBI internal affairs tells Jane that one of the thieves got away with the secret plastic container he's kept hidden for nine years and begs him to solve the case before the contents are revealed and his life is destroyed. LaRoche suspects that the person responsible for high-level security leaks inside the agency is also behind the theft of the box. Guest starring Pruitt Taylor Vince, with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Red John strikes again just as Jane narrows down the list of people who could be the serial killer to seven suspects, and the subsequent investigation uncovers a link between the victim and the CBI consultant. Guest starring Laura San Giacomo (Saving Grace, Pretty Woman), with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a pregnant woman with a drug habit. Goren and Eames focus their search on the victim's boyfriend and are highly suspicious of his story, but further evidence leads them to realise other members of his wealthy family may have been involved. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the death of church sexton Morris Abernathy and discover the victim had a relationship with the killer, leading to a widening scandal involving money embezzled from the collection funds. Starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The driver of a Ferrari is gunned down by a motorcyclist and the victim is identified as petty officer Colin Boxer, who was holding down a second job as a valet parker and had borrowed the sports car. The owner of the vehicle turns out to be Vijay Chaya, the billionaire head of a large corporation, and the team suspects a case of mistaken identity. During the course of the investigation, Gibbs chances on a medal awarded to Leroy Jethro Moore, the man he was named after and an estranged friend of his father. Guest starring Billy Dee Williams (The Empire Strikes Back) and Ralph Waite (The Waltons).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. First lieutenant Michael Torres gets involved in a fight before falling to the ground, and is found beaten to death the next morning. The only witness is his friend and colleague Captain Joe Westcott, who suffers from post-traumatic stress disorder and has trouble distinguishing reality from his past military experiences in the Middle East.(n)

programme.title: 24: Legacy
programme.desc: Carter and CTU make use of a new lead to close in on an enemy's location. Meanwhile, Amira comes to a crossroads as her plan nears completion.(n)

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: David seeks some sense of closure as he heads back to where his whole ordeal began. Superhero thriller, starring Dan Stevens.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois discovers that she has an estranged brother, and combs the country in search of him, eventually finding him in a psychiatric hospital. Meanwhile, Peter starts a society for fat men. Animation, featuring the guest voice of Robert Downey Jr.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: The Father, the Son and the Holy Fonz.
programme.desc: Peter decides to start a new religion dedicated to his favourite Happy Days character, the Fonz, but finds it hard to recruit members. Meanwhile, a mishap leaves a disgruntled Stewie stuck in a bubble.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger is offended by the family during his birthday celebrations, and vows to turn his life around - and take revenge. However, the alien takes things a step too far, causing the family to go on the run.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: In the 100th episode of the animated comedy, Stan and Francine try to stop Hayley from eloping with her boyfriend by offering a $50,000 reward to anyone stopping them. The entire town takes up the offer, including Steve and Roger under the alias Wheels and the Legman. Meanwhile, tragedy strikes at Langley Falls when 100 characters are killed off.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg tries to get friendly with the in-crowd at school, but becomes the target of their cruel mockery. Peter competes against Chris in a variety of winter pursuits, including a skating race and the unusual `kitchenware on face and head' contest - but there is a surprise in store for him.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter is struck by lightning and hovers on the brink of death. In his state of limbo he experiences flashbacks that make him realise he should pay more attention to his beloved wife. At the same time, he agrees to arrange a date for Death with the girl from the pet shop. Peter Frampton guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois becomes a martial arts expert and puts her new-found skills to use by chasing away tourists watching the leaves fall in Quahog. Unfortunately her zeal for combat soon infects the entire Griffin household, leading to an all-out family brawl.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: The Kiss Seen Around the World.
programme.desc: Meg lands a job at the local TV station, only to suffer the humiliation of having her first kiss broadcast to hordes of viewers. Meanwhile, Stewie plots an appropriate revenge on the miscreant who stole his tricycle.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter begins acting like a pirate, and recruits a crew of like-minded would-be buccaneers to cause havoc all over Quahog. Meanwhile, Chris falls in love with a veterinary intern named Anna. Animated comedy, featuring the guest voice of Amanda Bynes.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: A tribute marking the show's 100th episode, featuring some of the best moments, including satirical spoofs, jokes and musical numbers.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan bullies Steve in the hope of toughening him up, but Francine does not approve of his approach. Meanwhile, Roger announces he is planning to study crime-scene photography.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan's efforts to get his family in shape for a neighbourhood pool party end in disaster when he accidentally ruins the Smith name - so he decides to fake his family's death and move to escape the shame.(n)

programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.desc: Part one of two. A tourist yacht cruising off the coast of Somalia opens fire on a boat, killing a sheikh and his wife. Goren and Eames investigate and find a link to a Somali arms dealer at the centre of a federal case, and are shocked to discover that Captain Danny Ross could be implicated. The crime drama returns, starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Eric Bogosian.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Detective drama series, starring Kyra Sedgwick as Deputy Chief Brenda Leigh Johnson, who heads the Priority Murder Squad, a special unit of the LAPD handling sensitive, high-profile murders. In her first case since arriving in Los Angeles, Brenda uncovers a disastrous love affair and a mysterious past as she investigates a death at the home of a multi-millionaire computer company executive.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates the murder of a high-profile model, killed with the unusual weapon of poisoned hair conditioner. While suspicion initially falls on the victim's film-star husband, the case proves more complicated than expected. The detective is also reunited with an old boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The detectives investigate when it is revealed that a series of female murder victims are all ex-girlfriends of a notoriously abusive lawyer. Starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A conman is found beaten to death in a hotel room, prompting Goren and Eames to look for a group of investors he swindled. Starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Tony reviews satellite footage of rebel forces in the Middle East and spots Kersey among a group of insurgents, concluding that Joe Westcott's fear of him was well-founded. Back at HQ, Abby creates a 3D computer model of the attack that occurred in Afghanistan and Joe dons a virtual-reality headset to relive the traumatic events. Will it jog his memory?.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Teenager Lydia Wade manages to escape a gang of masked men trying to abduct her and her friend Rosie, the daughter of a US Navy commander. Lydia's Navy captain father David Wade was shot dead during the attack and her mother is overseas, so Ziva offers to look after the girl, while Abby tries to jog her memory by creating facial reconstructions of the attackers based on some grainy CCTV footage. DiNozzo and McGee find links on Rosie's laptop to possible suspect John `Diesel' Stevens.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Little Big Girl. Lisa invents fragments of her family's history to impress her classmates and scores well on a school diversity project. As she gains notoriety for her incredibly detailed story, Lisa feels guilty but keeps the farce alive, hoping it will all blow over. When she finally admits to the fabrication, she must endure sensitivity training. Meanwhile, Bart meets a girl who he thinks got pregnant from kissing him(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Midsummer's Nice Dreams. When Cheech and Chong (guest voicing as themselves) do a gig at Springfield on their much-anticipated reunion tour, they are impressed to hear Homer delivering all their punchlines by heart. Cheech invites Homer to go on tour with him as new duo 'Cheech and Chunk', while Chong forms a more progressive comedy team called 'Teach and Chong' with Principal Skinner. Marge tries to help the neighbourhood cat lady change her hoarder ways, but turns into a hoarder herself in the process(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Fugue and Riffs. Archer has amnesia, brought about by the trauma of watching his mother get married, and believes he is now a fry cook at a burger joint called Bob's Burgers!(n)

programme.title: The War Wagon
programme.desc: A convict is released from prison and swears vengeance on the corrupt mining contractor who took his gold-rich land. On the way, he encounters an old enemy who reveals that the gold from the mine is about to be transported in an armoured stagecoach - and suggests they join forces to steal it. Western, starring John Wayne, Kirk Douglas, Bruce Cabot and Howard Keel.(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon
programme.desc: The 19th-century sleuth and his indefatigable sidekick Watson are transported to Second World War London, where they set out to foil a Nazi attempt to steal part of an experimental weapon. Mystery thriller, starring Basil Rathbone and Nigel Bruce.(n)

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: The survivors of a torpedoed passenger ship are set adrift in a lifeboat. As they pull out other survivors from the sea, they realise one of them is the U-boat commander responsible for the disaster. Alfred Hitchcock's Second World War drama, starring Tallulah Bankhead, Walter Slezak, William Bendix, Hume Cronyn and Henry Hull.(n)

programme.title: Yangtse Incident
programme.desc: A British frigate is heavily shelled and captured by Chinese communists on the Yangtse River in 1949. After a failed rescue mission by a sister ship, the remaining crew members put into action a daring escape plan that involves disguising the vessel and slipping her moorings under the cover of darkness. Fact-based action adventure, starring Richard Todd, William Hartnell and Akim Tamiroff.(n)

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners 2
programme.desc: Awkward teenagers Will, Simon and Neil find university life does not live up to their expectations, and are insanely jealous of Jay's stories of his gap year in Australia. Heading Down Under to meet their friend, they inevitably discover he has exaggerated his escapades - so decide to go in search of a real adventure. Comedy sequel, starring Simon Bird, James Buckley, Joe Thomas and Blake Harrison.(n)

programme.title: Young Adult
programme.desc: Premiere. A selfish teenager grows up to be an alcoholic failed writer. When she learns her high-school sweetheart's wife has just had a baby, she refuses to believe he can be happy without her, and returns to her home town to steal him away from his happy family, finding an unlikely ally in a classmate whose adolescence she made a misery. Comedy, starring Charlize Theron, Patrick Wilson and Patton Oswalt.(n)

programme.title: What Richard Did
programme.desc: A wealthy teenager manages to seduce another student's girlfriend, but his confidence is shaken by her continuing friendship with her ex. His insecurity results in a violent confrontation that has unforeseen consequences, and leads to his seemingly charmed life rapidly falling apart. Drama, starring Jack Reynor and Roisin Murphy.(n)

programme.title: Large
programme.desc: A lazy teenager gleefully awaits his 18th birthday, when he is due to inherit a fortune from his late rock star father. However, he learns a clause in the Will states that he does not get a penny unless he can get a stable job and a steady girlfriend. Comedy, starring Luke de Woolfson and Morwenna Banks.(n)

programme.title: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: A backwoods trapper signs up as a cavalry scout at a fort manned by inexperienced soldiers, where he falls in love with a colonel's wife. On taking over command of the garrison, the officer plans to lead his men in a reckless attack on a hostile Indian tribe - and it is down to the frontiersman to save his comrades from a massacre. Western, starring Victor Mature, Robert Preston and Anne Bancroft.(n)

programme.title: Trapeze
programme.desc: Two circus performers fall for a seductive newcomer, leading to all manner of amorous antics and rivalry as each pulls out all the stops to win her heart. Drama, starring Burt Lancaster, Tony Curtis, Gina Lollobrigida, Katy Jurado, Thomas Gomez and Sid James.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: An egocentric professor leads an expedition on a journey into the Amazon on a mission to prove his theory that dinosaurs still survive there. On arrival, they find the prehistoric beasts are all too real - and only one of the dangers they face. Fantasy adventure, based on Arthur Conan Doyle's classic novel, starring Claude Rains, Michael Rennie and Jill St John.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Jack
programme.desc: A bumbling midshipman's uniform is stolen by a woman desperate to go to sea, who adopts his identity. Later, the hapless sailor is press-ganged on to the same ship as her. However, while trying to prove who he really is, he has to contend with mutinies, pirates and the Spanish Navy. Comedy, with Bernard Cribbins, Juliet Mills, Kenneth Williams and Charles Hawtrey.(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: An idle womaniser pretends to be a father to meet women in a single mothers' group - but he starts to change his selfish ways when a lonely youngster with a depressed mum becomes emotionally attached to him. Romantic comedy adapted from Nick Hornby's novel, starring Hugh Grant, Toni Collette, Nicholas Hoult and Rachel Weisz.(n)

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: A sixtysomething confirmed bachelor finally decides to settle down with his much younger girlfriend. He and three friends decide to mark the occasion by reliving their wild youth with a trip to Las Vegas - but they find that both the city and each other have changed since their glory days. Comedy, starring Michael Douglas, Robert De Niro, Morgan Freeman and Kevin Kline.(n)

programme.title: Girlhood
programme.desc: Premiere. A teenage girl longs to escape her abusive family life and her male dominated neighbourhood. She finds solace in joining an all-female gang and having a relationship with an older man, but begins to realise that far more drastic steps are needed if she is to ever have the independence she craves. Drama, starring Karidja Toure and Assa Sylla. In French.(n)

programme.desc: Ina Garten prepares an indulgent breakfast, including bread pudding, garlic herb tomatoes and maple roasted bacon.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa

programme.title: Anna Olson: Fresh
programme.desc: The chef uses short ribs to create country-style ribs in a stew-like Italian-style sauce.(n)

programme.title: Anna Olson: Fresh
programme.desc: The chef prepares potato dishes, including potato-wrapped chicken with pancetta and sage.(n)

programme.title: Ace of Cakes

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond prepares a breakfast for cattle workers, including breakfast potatoes, spicy scrambled eggs, biscuits and sausage gravy.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond prepares a dinner to eat around a bonfire as she serves up a menu of crispy fried chicken, perfect potato salad, crunchy coleslaw and individual key lime pies.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: A surprise 16th birthday party sees pasta bar with spaghetti sauce, pesto and grilled chicken served. For dessert is an chocolate chip and caramel ice-cream sundae.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond makes food that can be made in a hurry with recipes for a quick and easy apple tart and a speedy shrimp stir-fry.(n)

programme.title: Extra Virgin
programme.desc: Gabriele Corcos and Debi Mazar visit Colonnata, Italy, and meet with master lardo makers, before heading back to their kitchen to make coniglio fritto.(n)

programme.title: Extra Virgin
programme.desc: Debi Mazar and Gabriele Corcos explore the Chianti region of Italy, and pick up the ingredients for ragu di cianghiale and a ricotta cheesecake.(n)

programme.title: Indian Food Made Easy
programme.desc: Food writer Anjum Anand teaches Londoner Jonathon Readman how to cook fried spicy aubergines, authentic vindaloo and stuffed sea bass in an effort to impress his mother-in-law, who is from Goa. Along the way he also learns the secrets of dry-roasting spices and receives tips on making sausages.(n)

programme.title: Indian Food Made Easy
programme.desc: Food writer and chef Anjum Anand travels to Bradford, where she teaches a volunteer chef on the Yorkshire Dales steam railway how to cook a selection of Kashmiri dishes. On the menu are rogan josh with pilaf rice in a seasoned broth, peppers stuffed with a spicy cheese, and angel vermicelli with orange cream.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals
programme.sub-title: Asian Fish and Ultimate Pork Tacos.
programme.desc: Chef Jamie Oliver prepares a selection of dishes including Asian fish, miso noodles and crunchy vegetables. Plus, `ultimate' pork tacos, spicy black beans and avocado garden salad.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Chef Jamie Oliver demonstrates how to prepare two more quick recipes, beginning with sausage gnocchi, warm kale and bean salad, followed by Mexican chicken, wicked mole sauce and vegetables and rice.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's American Road Trip
programme.desc: Crusading chef Jamie Oliver meets former gangsters, cowboys and high-society women as he embarks on a culinary journey to discover the heart and soul of America. programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond embarks on a big food-shopping trip, buying chicken thighs to prepare peach and whiskey chicken.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ladd is busy coaching at a football training camp, so Ree makes lunch for 120 hungry staff and children, whipping up a picnic of hot roast beef sandwiches.(n)

programme.title: Chinese Food in Minutes
programme.desc: Two gospel singers learn how to cook up a feast for their choir. Ching-He Huang teaches them recipes for chicken and black bean stir-fry, and sweet and sour ribs.(n)

programme.title: Chinese Food in Minutes
programme.desc: Armed with ingredients sourced from London's Chinatown, Ching-He Huang teaches two busy barmen how to prepare quick and easy wok classics, including a chicken and snake bean stir-fry, sweet-and-sour duck, and yellow bean scallops with wild rice salad.(n)

programme.title: Spring Baking Championship
programme.desc: The seven remaining bakers take on outdoor activities with a ballpark snack dessert and barbeque dessert.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's American Road Trip

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Rebecca is fired and replaced as manager by Sam - who generously rehires her but fails to make it clear there are strings attached. Comedy, starring Ted Danson and Kirstie Alley.(n)

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam finds out an ex-girlfriend's child might be his and swears an oath of celibacy to preclude the possibility of siring any more unwanted heirs. Ted Danson stars.(n)

programme.title: The Best of Tommy Cooper
programme.desc: Comedy highlights, courtesy of the frantic funnyman with the fez, featuring his unique style of magical illusion.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Whitbury Leisure Centre grinds to a halt as Brittas's hi-tech computer system goes online - much to the consternation of the baffled staff. As no one seems capable of even booking a simple swimming ticket, Councillor Drugget expresses his sense of foreboding about the whole scheme. Chris Barrie and Pippa Haywood star.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Gordon returns from a management course determined to unleash his inner powers, but his staff go a little overboard in the self-realisation stakes and he soon finds himself out of a job. Chris Barrie and Harriet Thorpe star.(n)

programme.title: Sorry
programme.desc: Timothy gets out of his depth while helping arrange Frank's wedding - and then falls for a bridesmaid.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Compo and Clegg hatch a devious plan to free henpecked Wally and Howard from their wives - if only for a few hours. Bill Owen and Peter Sallis star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: After Clegg is visited by three teenage missionaries, Seymour believes it is about time he offered his considerable talents and services to the local vicar, so sets about selling tickets for its staging of The Tales of Beatrix Potter. Peter Sallis and Michael Aldridge star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Seymour vows that the days of Edie having to carry a dustbin are over, and promises to install a waste disposal unit for her. Meanwhile, a former wartime comrade of Wally's makes an appearance. Michael Aldridge, Thora Hird and Joe Gladwin star.(n)

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: Ben and Susan experience problems in the bedroom, leaving Abi convinced she is the one to blame. Janey tries her hand at being a personal shopper and Michael gets caught up in a case of mistaken identity. Robert Lindsay and Zoe Wanamaker star.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Judith goes away for the weekend, leaving Lionel and Jean with the house to themselves. Comedy about late-blossoming love, starring Judi Dench and Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Lionel becomes depressed that his abilities are dwindling as he ages, while Jean meets his active, outgoing and eccentric father Rocky for the first time - and finds him surprisingly endearing. Comedy, starring Judi Dench and Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Whitbury Leisure Centre grinds to a halt as Brittas's hi-tech computer system goes online - much to the consternation of the baffled staff. As no one seems capable of even booking a simple swimming ticket, Councillor Drugget expresses his sense of foreboding about the whole scheme. Chris Barrie and Pippa Haywood star.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Gordon returns from a management course determined to unleash his inner powers, but his staff go a little overboard in the self-realisation stakes and he soon finds himself out of a job. Chris Barrie and Harriet Thorpe star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Having witnessed his sister Edie fail several driving tests, Seymour gallantly volunteers to help teach her. However, because he is unable to control a vehicle himself, he needs a qualified motorist to ride along. Michael Aldridge and Thora Hird star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Seymour comes up with another madcap scheme to harness the power of nature using an old sail, a pair of roller skates and, in Compo, a very gullible `test pilot'. Michael Aldridge, Bill Owen and Peter Sallis star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: When You Take a Good Bite, Yorkshire Tastes Terrible.
programme.desc: When Clegg receives news of an old friend dying in America, Compo and Seymour join him on a journey down memory lane, recalling time spent at school walking on gates and climbing trees - forgetting, of course, that it was many years ago. Poignant instalament of the long-running comedy, featuring the final appearance of Joe Gladwin as Wally Batty.(n)

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: Ben and Susan experience problems in the bedroom, leaving Abi convinced she is the one to blame. Janey tries her hand at being a personal shopper and Michael gets caught up in a case of mistaken identity. Robert Lindsay and Zoe Wanamaker star.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotters meet a pregnant German woman who is in need of help, so eternal optimist Del-Boy becomes her saviour, aiming to earn himself some money into the bargain by making Marlene and Boycie's dreams come true. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Buster Merryfield and John Challis.(n)

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: A party of German guests comes to stay and Basil resolves to ensure everyone is on their best behaviour. Regrettably, a nasty case of concussion sustained during a fire drill ensures his plans come crashing down. Starring John Cleese, Prunella Scales and Andrew Sachs.(n)

programme.title: Boomers
programme.desc: The friends gather for Joyce's retirement party, where John has made a tribute video - but forgotten to ask Trevor for his contribution - and Maureen latches onto a trendy young couple. Alan also has bad news that might ruin proceedings - unless the guest of honour spoils it first by confronting her neighbour about her kids' unruly behaviour. Alison Steadman and Philip Jackson star in the sitcom, with Russ Abbot, Stephanie Beacham, Paula Wilcox and James Smith.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.sub-title: Gavin & Stacey Christmas Special: The Christmas Announcement.
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, the Wests join the Shipmans for one of Mick's famous turkey dinners. Smithy can hardly wait to spend his first yuletide with baby Neil, but fails to realise Dave will be tagging along and playing happy families with Nessa. Meanwhile, Gavin and Stacey make an announcement that does not exactly fill their friends and relatives with joy, and Bryn has a heart-to-heart with Jason. Festive edition of the comedy from 2008, starring Mathew Horne and Joanna Page.(n)

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Guy showers Lucy with expensive gifts before taking her on a mystery weekend away, causing Lee to become suspicious of his motives. He concludes Guy must be a gangster, but Barbara and Tim believe his paranoia about the subject stems from his own yearning for Lucy's affections.(n)

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee wants to spend time alone with Lucy at Christmas, but the unexpected arrival of Tim, Daisy and assorted relatives threatens his plans. The situation seems to be under control, until someone suggests playing a murder mystery game. Festive episode of the comedy from 2007, starring Lee Mack, Sally Bretton and Tim Vine.(n)

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: Basil goes to great lengths to prove to Sybil that a guest has smuggled a woman into his room. Instead the hotelier keeps being caught in compromising situations with a young Australian woman, and a visiting psychiatrist finds his increasingly manic behaviour both fascinating and alarming. Classic comedy first broadcast in 1979, starring John Cleese and Prunella Scales.(n)

programme.title: The Trip
programme.sub-title: The Trip to Italy: Il Riccio, Capri.
programme.desc: Steve's son Joe and his assistant Emma join him and Rob on the final leg of their culinary tour of Italy as they take the ferry from Naples to Capri, where they have lunch at Il Riccio. Afterwards, Rob asks Emma for advice about whether he should go back to Lucy, while Steve tells Joe he is going to buy a house closer to him. Comedy, starring Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Mark finds himself wallowing in depression about Dobby on New Year's Eve, but Jeremy is determined that the `El Dude Brothers' are going to enjoy the night of their lives. Comedy, starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Getting On
programme.desc: Following the incident with Matron Hilary Loftus, Kim Wilde tries to progress through her training modules while dealing with an unknown female. Meanwhile, a patient's daughter ends up requiring more attention than her elderly mother. Comedy drama about life on a hospital ward, starring Jo Brand, Nan Kerr and Lindy Whiteford.(n)

programme.title: Shooting Stars
programme.desc: Vic Reeves and Bob Mortimer introduce the madcap celebrity game show. Team captains Mark Lamarr and Ulrika Jonsson are joined by guests Syd Little, Eddie Large, Leslie Ash and Bill Oddie.(n)

programme.title: Shooting Stars
programme.desc: Vic Reeves and Bob Mortimer introduce the celebrity game show with guests Gareth Hale, Norman Pace, Patsy Palmer and Kathy Lloyd.(n)

programme.sub-title: One Happy Chappy in a Snappy Serape.

programme.title: The Brittas Empire

programme.desc: Lionel becomes suspicious of Alistair's overwhelming desire for his book to be a success. Comedy, starring Geoffrey Palmer and Judi Dench.(n)
