programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: Oscar-winning drama about a family traumatised by the death of its eldest son and how his younger brother copes with the tragedy. Timothy Hutton and Donald Sutherland star(n)

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Neil LaBute wrote and directed this kinky comedy-drama, about two colleagues who explore their sexuality over the course of a long layover. Stuck in Albuquerque during a business trip, Les (Matthew Broderick) and Natalie (Alice Eve) decide to get out of the airport and see the sights. While Natalie considers cheating on her partner, Les investigates a drunken affair he had the last time he was in the city -- only he doesn't remember if it was with a man or a woman. Dirty Weekend made its world premiere at the 2015 Tribeca Film Festival(n)

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, cop-turned-con artist Steven Russell (Jim Carrey) ends up in jail and meets fellow inmate Phillip Morris (Ewan McGregor), who becomes the love of his life. programme.title: Cinderella Man

programme.title: Southpaw

programme.title: Nick Cannon: Stand Up, Don't Shoot

programme.title: Drunk Stoned Brilliant Dead: The Story of the National Lampoon
programme.desc: The National Lampoon name has been synonymous with irreverent and outrageous comedy for the past forty-five years. This documentary takes the viewer on a tour through the history of the Lampoon, starting with early years of the magazine (which published its first issue in April, 1970) to its influence on groundbreaking comedy films such as Caddyshack, Vacation and Ghostbusters. For this film, director and former Lampoon illustrator Rick Meyerowitz, collected the best material from the magazines and interviewed Lampoon veterans from the early days to provide a glimpse into the innerworkings of this influential publication(n)

programme.title: Split Decisions
programme.desc: This family drama centers on an Irish brood in which the father and his two sons work as prizefighters. Both the boys are quite talented, but each has chosen a dramatically different means of exploiting their talent(n)

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: The story of the historic 1836 battle in the Texan War of Independence. Facing 4,000 Mexican troops, 186 Texan soldiers and volunteers - including William Travis, Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie retreat within the walls of the Alamo, a Franciscan mission that was converted into a military fort. Once inside, the men prepare themselves for what will be a bloody battle to the death(n)

programme.title: Stander
programme.desc: Crime drama based on the true story of Andre Stander, a South African police officer who became one of the country's most notorious bank robbers. After suffering a crisis of conscience due to his involvement in apartheid, Stander decides to defy the very system he was part of, and sets off on an audacious crime spree, robbing banks during his lunch hour then returning to the scene of the crime to lead the investigation. After a number of heists he is caught and jailed, where he befriends two hardened criminals and stages a daring jailbreak. The 'Stander Gang' then commit a number of increasingly bold robberies, and in the eyes of the public, their blatant disregard for authority makes them South Africa's most popular anti-heroes(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush

programme.title: The Howling Reborn

programme.title: Echoes of War

programme.title: Rampart

programme.title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
programme.desc: A laid-back health inspector's comfortable routine receives an unwelcome shake up when he's assigned the task of training his new rookie partner and investigating the outbreak of a mysterious illness at one of the city's most posh restraints in this no-holds-barred comedy starring Blue Collar standup king Larry the Cable Guy. It's all greasy spoons and low-rent ethnic eateries in the world of seasoned big-city health inspector Larry (Larry the Cable Guy), and that's just the way he likes it. After begrudgingly accepting the task of training by-the-books trainee Amy (Iris Bahr), Larry lands the biggest case of his career when a group of high-class diners fall ill following a particularly pricey meal. Though the gruff but lovable health inspector soon loses his job as a direct result of his questionable manners, he soon wins the heart of a shy waitress while attempting to go undercover to crack the case and ensure that the conspirators who engineered the poisonous plan are brought to justice(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A car chase through Manhattan leaves one man dead and a teenager injured, leading Fontana and Green to discover the victim was being followed after massacring a hunting party. As the man who led the chase is publicly lauded for his brave efforts, McCoy and Borgia make their case that his poor decisions only endangered other lives. Starring Sam Waterston and Annie Parisse.(n)

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: The grifters return for one last round of cons, targeting the greedy and corrupt with intricate scams to exact revenge for their victims - and making a bit of cash for themselves in the process. They begin by taking on a dealer who is famous for parting the elderly from their possessions for a pittance and trading stolen gold for a huge profit. Keen to give him a taste of his own medicine, the con artists pose as a renegade army unit, and soon have the crook champing at the bit with the promise of a consignment of looted Libyan treasure. Adrian Lester, Robert Vaughn and Robert Glenister star.(n)

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.desc: A reporter interviews a suspect in a serial killer case whom she believes to be innocent - but he turns out to be guilty and her actions give him the chance to kill again. Years later, she tries to put her mistakes behind her, only to find that somebody wants her dead. Mystery, starring Melissa George and Ryan Scott Greene.(n)

programme.title: Sony Movie News Extra
programme.desc: Update on the latest film news, rumours and celebrity gossip.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy and Borgia prosecute a famous basketball player accused of murdering a fan who had been harassing him for some time. They discover the star's fingerprints in the victim's apartment, but the evidence linking him to the crime scene is dismissed as inadmissible because the detectives cut corners to find a match on the police database. Starring Sam Waterston and Annie Parisse.(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Hard-hitting docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after the validity of key documents was questioned(n)

programme.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
programme.desc: Angela Bassett stars in this sexy, sassy romantic comedy about a 40-year-old mother who realises her life may be heading in the wrong direction. Stella Payne is a workaholic San Franciscan executive who spends what little spare time she has with her family. But then it occurs to her that she's missing out on something big - romance. Having encountered Winston Shakespeare (Taye Diggs), a Jamaican man 20 years her junior, Stella decides the time has come to get back on the dating circuit. but just how will she go about getting back her groove?(n)

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A bounty hunter must fight to stay alive as he plays a deadly game, created by a wealthy and evil mastermind, in which he must hunt down his opponents before they are able kill him(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Artifact hunter and archaeologist extraordinaire Ben Franklin Gates learns of his own family's implication in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln by John Wilkes Booth. Gates must then locate an elusive diary, not only to clear his family's name, but to unearth and connect several secrets, buried within the book, that point to a massive, global conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: Action thriller in which an FBI agent agrees to have the face of a captured international terrorist grafted onto his own head in order to discover the location of an enormous bomb. The plan goes awry when the terrorist, having assumed the agent's identity, escapes and destroys all evidence of the switch in a deadly game of cat and mouse(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: Saint John. It is now 2015 and Julien's health is failing, but his determination to track down the missing girl means he has not finished with the Webster case just yet. programme.title: Grindhouse
programme.desc: In a throwback to 1970s exploitation films and drive-in double features, directors Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez serve up a chilling two-fer with "Death Proof" and "Planet Terror." The first is about a killer car; the second's a zombie flick. In the opener, Kurt Russell plays a stuntman wreaking havoc with his wheels of death. Then, survivors of a bio-weapon mishap battle an army of killer zombies. Rose McGowan has roles in both. Tarantino and Rodriguez also scripted their films(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: Action thriller in which an FBI agent agrees to have the face of a captured international terrorist grafted onto his own head in order to discover the location of an enormous bomb. The plan goes awry when the terrorist, having assumed the agent's identity, escapes and destroys all evidence of the switch in a deadly game of cat and mouse(n)

programme.title: Me, Myself & Irene
programme.desc: A nice-guy cop with dissociative identity disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to Los Angeles to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mother's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: A veteran pitcher played by , reflects on his life and career as he pitches his final game(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

Then, survivors of a bio-weapon mishap battle an army of killer zombies. Rose McGowan has roles in both. Tarantino and Rodriguez also scripted their films(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: Action thriller in which an FBI agent agrees to have the face of a captured international terrorist grafted onto his own head in order to discover the location of an enormous bomb. The plan goes awry when the terrorist, having assumed the agent's identity, escapes and destroys all evidence of the switch in a deadly game of cat and mouse(n)

programme.title: Me, Myself & Irene
programme.desc: A nice-guy cop with dissociative identity disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to Los Angeles to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mother's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: A veteran pitcher played by , reflects on his life and career as he pitches his final game(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: A critical and popular success, director Quentin Tarantino tells in flashback how a gang of thugs, including Harvey Keitel and Tim Roth, is recruited to carry out the perfect jewellery heist that goes horribly and violently wrong. With Michael Madsen, Christopher Penn, Steve Buscemi and Lawrence Tierney(n)

programme.title: Me, Myself & Irene
programme.desc: A nice-guy cop with dissociative identity disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates(n)

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: Johnny Depp plays George Jung, one of the first Americans to realise the profits to be made smuggling cocaine from Colombia into America in the 70s. Based on a real life story, Ted Demme's film follows Jung's rise and fall, as the authorities catch up with him. He's due to be released from prison in 2014(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: One of the most notorious slasher films of the 1980s returns to terrorize filmgoers with this blood-soaked remake that proves just how horrifying high school dances can truly be. Donna Keppel (Brittany Snow) has survived a terrible tragedy, but now the time has come to leave the past behind and celebrate her senior prom in style. When the big night finally arrives, Donna and her best friends prepare to enjoy their last big high-school blowout by living it up and partying till dawn. But while Donna is willing to look past her nightmares and into a brighter future, the man she thought she had escaped forever has returned for one last dance. An obsessed killer is on the loose, and he'll slay anyone who attempts to prevent him from reaching his one and only Donna. Who will survive to see graduation day, and what will Donna do when she's forced to confront her greatest fear? Scott Porter, Jessica Stroup, and Dana Davis co-star in the slasher remake that will have tuxedo-clad teens everywhere nervously looking over their shoulders as they file out onto the dance floor(n)

programme.title: 8MM
programme.desc: This moody crime drama focuses on a private eye (Nicolas Cage) investigating the authenticity of a snuff film found in the safe of a dead industrialist. The strong supporting cast features Joaquin Phoenix, James Gandolfini and Catherine Keener. Peter Stormare, Anthony Heald, Chris Bauer, Myra Carter, Amy Morton, Jenny Powell, Anne Gee Byrd, Jack Betts, Luis Oropeza(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: A comedic grand slam detailing a couple whose romance is threatened by an obsession with the Boston Red Sox(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Thirteen Days
programme.desc: With the world on the cusp of nuclear war, presidential advisor Kenny O'Donnell joins the intelligence team around Jack Kennedy. Military hawks push for invasion, but JFK isn't so sure, in this classy thriller of international power and paranoia(n)

programme.title: Making a Killing: Guns, Greed, and the NRA
programme.desc: A study of the impact of gun sales in the United States(n)

programme.title: The Accused
programme.desc: This movie is based on actual events. Sarah Tobias goes into a bar one night and winds up being gang raped by 3 guys. She is introduced to an attorney named Katherine Murphy. Not only does Katherine Murphy want to go after the men who committed the rape, she wants to go after the men in the bar who cheered it on. But Katherine has her work cut out for her. Her client has a past, and that past could be used against her in court(n)

programme.title: Starz Insider: Life
programme.desc: A preview of the 2017 sci-fi film "Life," starring Ryan Reynolds and Jake Gyllenhaal(n)

programme.title: Thirteen Days
programme.desc: With the world on the cusp of nuclear war, presidential advisor Kenny O'Donnell joins the intelligence team around Jack Kennedy. Military hawks push for invasion, but JFK isn't so sure, in this classy thriller of international power and paranoia(n)

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: Poor Alabama musician Dewey Cox is determined to make his parents proud by becoming a star. Smart spoof of worthy music biopics from the writer of Knocked Up(n)

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: XXXVI. A rescue plan may come between Flint and Silver; Max discovers the real price of freedom; Rackham tracks his prey; the Walrus sails into uncharted territory(n)

programme.title: Making a Killing: Guns, Greed, and the NRA
programme.desc: A study of the impact of gun sales in the United States(n)

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: XXXVI. A rescue plan may come between Flint and Silver; Max discovers the real price of freedom; Rackham tracks his prey; the Walrus sails into uncharted territory(n)

Fact-based account of a group of gifted MIT scholars who develop a system for card-counting and use it to win big at Las Vegas casinos. Jim Sturgess, Kate Bosworth, Kevin Spacey. Directed by Robert Luketic(n)

programme.title: Entrapment
programme.desc: When a heavily guarded work of art is stolen, the insurance investigator persuades her employers to let her go undercover and team up with a master thief. The thief sets the woman a rigorous training programme before they embark on a series of robberies against an emotional backdrop of distrust and growing attraction(n)

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con tattoo artist (Mel Gibson) fights to protect his estranged teenage daughter (Erin Moriarty), who is being hunted by a Mexican drug cartel after getting mixed up in her boyfriend's criminal schemes. Michael Parks, William H. Macy, and Diego Luna co-star. Directed by Jean-François Richet(n)

programme.title: Blonde Ambition
programme.desc: Katie decides to leave her town and move to New York to live with her fiancé. When she gets there, he's in bed with another woman. Through a series of fortuitous events, she ends up getting a job as a personal assistant in a real estate development company. There, she becomes the unwitting pawn of two unscrupulous executives seeking to topple and replace the powerful CEO(n)

programme.title: Aquamarine
programme.desc: A mermaid agrees to grant a wish to two Florida teenagers if they help her romance a lifeguard(n)

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: In this comedy from director Boaz Yakin (Remember the Titans), Brittany Murphy stars as Molly Gunn, the daughter of a dead rock star, who lives off her inheritance and has never worked a day in her life. When her father's estate is swindled away from her, Molly suddenly finds her life of luxury and excess pulled out from under her. Begrudgingly, she decides that she has to get a job and is hired as a nanny for Ray Schliene (Dakota Fanning), the daughter of record executive Roma Schliene (Heather Locklear). At first Molly can't shake her spoiled-brat personality, but eventually she and Ray discover that they have a lot in common and a strong bond is formed. Jesse Spencer plays Molly's boyfriend, and Donald Faison, who previously worked with Murphy in Clueless, plays another record executive who offers Molly a place to live until she gets on her feet(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade in this wild horror comedy. Now, three teens must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con tattoo artist (Mel Gibson) fights to protect his estranged teenage daughter (Erin Moriarty), who is being hunted by a Mexican drug cartel after getting mixed up in her boyfriend's criminal schemes. Michael Parks, William H. Macy, and Diego Luna co-star. Directed by Jean-François Richet(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Nick Hornby novel about the friendship that develops between a bright but awkward 12-year-old boy and a wayward thirtysomething man masquerading as a lone parent in a bid to seduce single mothers. Ironically, it is the boy who initiates the bachelor into the world of adult responsibility and meaningful relationships as the bond between them deepens(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Siblings reunite at their childhood home after their parents, avant-garde artists who specialize in public comedy skits, go missing. They soon wonder if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: The hilarious catalogue of the exploits of a bunch of young army recruits. Bill Murray stars as a wisecracking good-for-nothing who's been tempted by the army's latest advertising campaign and who has managed to get his best buddy Ramis to join him in signing up. The late John Candy gets an early role as the (predictably) large recruit who gets in on all the fun and games - some at his own expense(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: A retired Special Forces colonel storms the South American stronghold of terrorists who have kidnapped his daughter to blackmail him into deposing a Latin dictator(n)

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con tattoo artist (Mel Gibson) fights to protect his estranged teenage daughter (Erin Moriarty), who is being hunted by a Mexican drug cartel after getting mixed up in her boyfriend's criminal schemes. Michael Parks, William H. Macy, and Diego Luna co-star. Directed by Jean-François Richet(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Siblings reunite at their childhood home after their parents, avant-garde artists who specialize in public comedy skits, go missing. They soon wonder if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt(n)

programme.title: 28 Days
programme.desc: A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after stealing a limousine and crashing it into a house(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is the sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, only to find himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Cuba Gooding Jr. (a role that was to win him an Oscar). His personal life starts to fall apart, as he's torn between love and money in Cameron Crowe's metaphor on American's need for success and money(n)

programme.title: The Salt of the Earth
programme.desc: Profiling Brazilian photojournalist Sebastião Salgado, whose black-and-white portraits often focused on impoverished communities. This insightful documentary was co-directed by Wim Wenders and Juliano Ribeiro Salgado, the director's son(n)

programme.title: Hair
programme.desc: A young Oklahoma man gets a taste of New York hippie life, before he goes to fight in the Vietnam War(n)

programme.title: Manhattan
programme.desc: Television gag writer Isaac Davis aches over betraying his best friend and frets about pursuing 17-year-old Tracy. With a glorious Gershwin score and elegant cinematography by Gordon Willis, this is a magnificent ode to New York(n)

programme.title: Secuestro Express
programme.desc: This gripping story of corruption and rampant kidnappings in Latin America focuses on the harrowing ordeal of an upper-class couple who are abducted by three ruthless thugs. Mia Maestro, Ruben Blades, Carlos Julio Molina, Pedro Perez. Directed by Jonathan Jakubowicz(n)

programme.title: In My Country
programme.desc: An Afrikaans reporter and an American journalist have an affair while covering a South African investigation into human-rights violations in this earnest drama(n)

programme.title: Catch a Fire
programme.desc: Based on the true-story of Patrick Chamusso, a South African oil refinery foreman who was unfairly arrested as a suspect when the refinery was sabotaged(n)

programme.title: Jack Goes Boating
programme.desc: Jack is a shy limo driver just over forty in New York. His only hobbies are smoking weed and listening to reggae. A colleague unites him with Connie, who also doesn't have the best self-confidence. Together they try to work their way through all the awkward silences and converge(n)

programme.title: Kill Your Darlings
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Allen Ginsberg looks to a new group of contemporaries to sound his progressive ideas against, but one of his new group takes the creative attitude too far(n)

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Compelling drama. When alcoholic screenwriter Ben is fired from his job, he goes to Las Vegas with the intention of drinking himself to death. He meets prostitute Sera, who is on the run from her pimp. The two begin an unconventional love affair, with her promising not to ask him to stop drinking, and him agreeing not to question her lifestyle. Nicolas Cage won the Best Actor Oscar for his performance(n)

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: An unspoken love grows between a devoted butler and a gregarious housekeeper working in an estate in post-World War II Britain(n)

programme.title: Pollock
programme.desc: Portraying one of this century's most influential artists, actor and director Ed Harris goes to extraordinary lengths in giving an accurate image of Jackson Pollock's often troublesome life.Jackson Pollock became America's first "Art Star" and his bold paintings changed the course of modern art. But the torments that plagued his days - perhaps the ones that drove him to paint in the first place - haunted him for his whole life. 'Pollock' won one Oscar and the TFCA Award at the Toronto Film Critics Association Awards, 2001(n)

programme.title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
programme.desc: A surreal crime drama told as only Jim Jarmusch could, Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai stars Forest Whitaker as Ghost Dog, a hit man living in an unidentified but run-down city in what license plates call "The Industrialized State." Known for his gift of being able to come and go without people noticing him, Ghost Dog is a self-taught samurai who is obsessed with order and his strict personal moral code, drawn from the philosophies of the Japanese warriors. As every samurai needs a leader to whom he swears loyalty, Ghost Dog has devoted himself the service of Louie (John Tormey), a low-level crime boss who once saved his life. When Louie's superiors decide he must be executed, Ghost Dog leaps into action, methodically wiping out his many enemies. Along with a dizzying series of stylized shoot-outs, Ghost Dog also features carrier pigeons, characters who read Rashomon, a French-speaking ice cream man, and a score by RZA from the top-selling hip-hop group Wu-Tang Clan, who have their own well-documented obsession with Asian culture. Ghost Dog was screened in competition at the 1999 Cannes Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Sound and the Fury
programme.desc: James Franco directs this adaptation of William Faulkner's The Sound and the Fury, the writer's tale of the Compson family, a once wealthy Southern clan devolving into obscurity. Tim Blake Nelson portrays the patriarch, a boozy lawyer who oversees the lives of his children with cynical monologues delivered through an alcoholic haze. Quentin, the oldest child, goes to Harvard, but he's very close with Caddy, the only daughter in the family who has a child out of wedlock. Second son Jason attempts to rule the family with an iron fist, but he's full of resentment towards Caddy's bastard child. All of them attempt to care for the developmentally disabled Benjy (Franco). Franco employs a fractured approach to the narrative in an attempt to capture Faulkner's distinctive prose style. The Sound and the Fury screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Grey Zone
programme.desc: Actor, writer, and director Tim Blake Nelson adapts this grim look at the holocaust from his own play, based on Miklos Nyiszli's book, Auschwitz: A Doctor's Eyewitness Account. The film centers on the sonderkommando: Jewish concentration camp prisoners whose job was to herd their fellow Jews into the gas chamber, and to dispose of the bodies following the execution. In return, these prisoners received food and a little more time before their own executions. As the members of the sonderkommando struggle to orchestrate what would be the only armed insurrection in Auschwitz, a group of them discover a 14-year-old girl who somehow survived the gas chamber. The girl becomes a symbol for their own spiritual salvation and they become obsessed with keeping the girl alive, even if it endangers the uprising that could save thousands. This film was screened at the 2001 Toronto Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Pi
programme.desc: In this award-winning intellectual thriller, a math genius (Sean Gullette) develops a dangerous obsession with an elusive 216-number sequence. He is pursued by corporate agents who are also after the number, which is tied to the stock market. Mark Margolis, Ben Shenkman. Written and directed by Darren Aronofsky(n)

programme.title: Aileen: Life and Death of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Nick Broomfield's second documentary on Aileen Carol Wuornos, a highway prostitute who was executed in 2002 for killing seven men in the state of Florida(n)

programme.title: Scenic Route
programme.desc: Two longtime friends (Josh Duhamel and Dan Fogler) whose bond has grown frail become locked in a bitter life-or-death struggle after their pickup truck breaks down in the desert in this drama from the directing duo of Michael and Kevin Goetz(n)

programme.title: Side Effects
programme.desc: A woman commits a horrific act while taking an anti-anxiety drug, which leads to a criminal investigation of her therapist that digs up possible evidence of past indiscretions(n)

programme.title: The Filth and the Fury
programme.desc: Although their initial career lasted only 26 months, the Sex Pistols changed the music scene forever. This intimate and shocking portrait of the notorious punk rock band documents their rise from the streets of 70's London through their crucifixion by the tabloids, canonization by fans around the world and ultimately their implosion on tour in America(n)

programme.title: No
programme.desc: Gael García Bernal stars as an ad exec who agrees to produce the TV ads for a campaign against Chile's dictator Augusto Pinochet(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: Saint John. It is now 2015 and Julien's health is failing, but his determination to track down the missing girl means he has not finished with the Webster case just yet. Back in Germany, the press descend on Eckhausen for a trial when a seemingly vital piece of new evidence comes to light. Gemma is surprised by a phone call from Julien and finds a new purpose that helps break through her stupor(n)

programme.title: Son of Saul
programme.desc: Saul, a Hungarian prisoner, is assigned to burn the corpses of his own people in one of the Auschwitz Crematoriums. He finds moral survival when he tries to secure a proper Jewish burial of his son(n)

programme.title: Saint Laurent
programme.desc: The life of designer Yves Saint Laurent is depicted in this biopic(n)

programme.desc: Saint John. It is now 2015 and Julien's health is failing, but his determination to track down the missing girl means he has not finished with the Webster case just yet. Back in Germany, the press descend on Eckhausen for a trial when a seemingly vital piece of new evidence comes to light. programme.title: The Son of No One
programme.desc: A young cop is assigned to the precinct in Queens where he grew up, and he finds his life threatened when he investigates a police cover-up involving the unsolved murders of two boys(n)

programme.title: Richard Pryor: Live and Smokin'
programme.desc: Richard Pryor's performance at the New York Improv on April, 29th, 1971 features the comedian giving his thoughts on sex, drugs, and race relations. Included is "Wino Preacher & Willie the Junkie," showcasing Pryor in the irreverent style that parlayed his career as a stand-up comic into a successful international star of films and television. There is an advisory warning for the strong language(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: Cedric the Entertainer racks up the miles and piles on the smiles in this wild road-trip comedy. He plays the patriarch of a dysfunctional California family, traveling to a family reunion in Missouri. En route, they encounter obstacles---and laughs---at every turn(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
programme.desc: In this sequel to the comedy Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo, the bewildered, amusing, irresistible Deuce Bigalow (Rob Schneider) is invited over to Amsterdam by his friend, T.J. Hicks. After several boys in the program have been killed in the city, T.J. is accused of being the serial killer. It is up to Deuce to help him prove his innocence. While attending secret gigolo society meetings, the hero causes great confusion and, in addition, falls in love with a beautiful model(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: Ricki is an aging rock-n'roll-loving woman who abandoned her family in order to chase her tattered dream of becoming a famous rock star. Now, she is given one last chance to set things right when her ex-husband, Pete, asks her to visit her estranged daughter, Julie, in Chicago(n)

programme.title: Summer Rental
programme.desc: A harried suburbanite gets into a number of misadventures during a family vacation that culminates in a boat race(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: A disillusioned Israeli counter-terrorist soldier fakes his own death in order to fulfil his dream of becoming a New York hairdresser, but his past soon catches up with him(n)

programme.desc: In this sequel to the comedy Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo, the bewildered, amusing, irresistible Deuce Bigalow (Rob Schneider) is invited over to Amsterdam by his friend, T.J. Hicks. After several boys in the program have been killed in the city, T.J. is accused of being the serial killer. It is up to Deuce to help him prove his innocence. While attending secret gigolo society meetings, the hero causes great confusion and, in addition, falls in love with a beautiful model(n)

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: Humorist Dave Barry's comic novel is the basis for this frenetic romp, set in Miami. It's the story of a crazy group of people whose lives interconnect. Included: a Pulitzer Prize-winning columnist; a nasty industrialist; his put-upon wife; hit men; and a philosophical street person(n)

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: This wild, futuristic action-fantasy is set in the year 2033 where drought and pollution have turned the Earth into a desert wasteland. The planet's water supply is controlled by a despotic company that is opposed by a few courageous rebels who regularly risk their lives to poach the precious fluid(n)

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: Humorist Dave Barry's comic novel is the basis for this frenetic romp, set in Miami. It's the story of a crazy group of people whose lives interconnect. Included: a Pulitzer Prize-winning columnist; a nasty industrialist; his put-upon wife; hit men; and a philosophical street person(n)

programme.title: A Fish Called Wanda
programme.desc: A straight-laced British lawyer becomes involved with a wacky bunch of jewel thieves(n)

programme.title: Hudson Hawk
programme.desc: Eddie Hawkins, called Hudson Hawk has just been released from ten years of prison and is planning to spend the rest of his life honestly. But then the crazy Mayflower couple blackmail him to steal some of the works of Leonardo da Vinci. If he refuses, they threaten to kill his friend Tommy(n)

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: Fed up with mundane middle-age, four friends hop on their Harleys and head for the Pacific, but they'll have to get past a gang of biker bandits first(n)

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich after finding black oil, he and his kin move to posh Beverly Hills(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A man hoping to make his way back to the big time starts by heading back to middle school in this comedy. Roy McCormick (Martin Lawrence) is one of the most successful coaches in college basketball, but he's just as famous for his hair-trigger temper as he is for molding winning teams. When an outburst of anger during a game escalates into an embarrassing public indecent, McCormick loses his job and is banned from college sports. Looking for a way to rehabilitate his image, McCormick takes a job coaching the basketball team at the middle school he used to attend, only to discover his players are a handful of misfits and losers with no skill on the court. Can McCormick mold the kids into a winning team -- and make himself into a better man along the way? Rebound also stars Wendy R. Robinson, Breckin Meyer, Horatio Sanz, Megan Mullally, and Patrick Warburton(n)

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: When a hard-luck blue-collar worker and his two best friends are mistaken for Army Reservists by a tough-talking Army sergeant, the plane set to fly them to the front lines of Iraq mistakenly drops them in the middle of Mexico to disastrous results in a freewheeling military comedy starring Larry the Cable Guy, Bill Engvall, and D.J. Qualls. Larry (the Cable Guy) has lost his job and his woman in the short span of 24 hours. Convinced that some suds and target shooting are just the right remedies for a broken, jobless heart, Larry sets out with his next-door neighbor Bill (Engvall) and their trigger-happy pal Everett (Qualls) in order to blast off some rounds and down some brews. Their relaxing weekend soon takes an unexpected turn, however, when hard-case Army sergeant Kilgrove (Keith David) mistakes the trio as slacking Army reservists and loads them in a plane bound for Fallujah. Subsequently air-dropped over Mexico due to pilot error, the clueless, wannabe war heroes become convinced that they're actually in the Middle East and set out to save a rural village from what they assume to be an insurgent uprising. Though the thankful locals champion the noble but dimwitted trio for their heroism, the celebration is short-lived as ruthless warlord Carlos Santana (Danny Trejo) pays a personal visit to the town with a plan to confront the fearless warriors who dared to challenge his iron-fist rule(n)

programme.title: Just Before I Go
programme.desc: A suicidal ne'er-do-well Seann William Scott puts together a bucket list for a last visit to his hometown: tell the truth to everyone close to him, confront the high school bully (Rob Riggle) who made his life miserable, and try again for romance with an ex-girlfriend (Mackenzie Marsh) before calling it quits forever. The problem is, maybe life isn't done with him yet(n)

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: Fed up with mundane middle-age, four friends hop on their Harleys and head for the Pacific, but they'll have to get past a gang of biker bandits first(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A man hoping to make his way back to the big time starts by heading back to middle school in this comedy. Roy McCormick (Martin Lawrence) is one of the most successful coaches in college basketball, but he's just as famous for his hair-trigger temper as he is for molding winning teams. When an outburst of anger during a game escalates into an embarrassing public indecent, McCormick loses his job and is banned from college sports. Looking for a way to rehabilitate his image, McCormick takes a job coaching the basketball team at the middle school he used to attend, only to discover his players are a handful of misfits and losers with no skill on the court. Can McCormick mold the kids into a winning team -- and make himself into a better man along the way? Rebound also stars Wendy R. Robinson, Breckin Meyer, Horatio Sanz, Megan Mullally, and Patrick Warburton(n)

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: Police pup Shoeshine is disgraced after a poor performance, but an accident sees him doused in superpowers and ready to save the day. Family action(n)

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich after finding black oil, he and his kin move to posh Beverly Hills(n)

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: Fed up with mundane middle-age, four friends hop on their Harleys and head for the Pacific, but they'll have to get past a gang of biker bandits first(n)

programme.title: Fired Up!
programme.desc: To get out of having to attend a sweltering hot football camp in Texas, two Illinois high-school athletes opt to try their luck at cheerleading camp instead(n)

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: When a hard-luck blue-collar worker and his two best friends are mistaken for Army Reservists by a tough-talking Army sergeant, the plane set to fly them to the front lines of Iraq mistakenly drops them in the middle of Mexico to disastrous results in a freewheeling military comedy starring Larry the Cable Guy, Bill Engvall, and D.J. Qualls. Larry (the Cable Guy) has lost his job and his woman in the short span of 24 hours. programme.title: Orgazmo
programme.desc: To earn money to return to Utah and marry his sweetheart, a young Mormon missionary is enticed into becoming a porno superhero. Donning a costume, he and a campy sidekick battle villains with a unique weapon(n)

programme.title: Hysteria
programme.desc: Set in Victorian London, Tanya Wexler's period comedy Hysteria tells the tale of Mortimer Granville (Hugh Dancy), a young doctor disturbed by the way most hospitals ignore the latest research on germ theory, and still treat patients with bleedings and leeches. After being fired from his most recent job for speaking out on the matter, he ends up in the employ of Dr. Robert Dalrymple (Jonathan Pryce) who runs a private practice specializing in treating women who suffer from "hysteria" and come to the doctor for his precise digital manipulations in order to get a release. With the help of Mortimer's best friend Edmund (Rupert Everett) together they create a device that allows these women to achieve the desired result much more quickly. Complicating matters, Mortimer becomes enamored of Dalrymple's strong-willed, feminist-minded daughter Charlotte (Maggie Gyllenhaal). Hysteria played at the 2011 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Kiss of Death
programme.desc: A former thief turned family man finds his efforts to go straight hampered by his underworld contacts. His cousin coerces him into taking one more job, but when things go wrong, the family face the attentions of the police and the wrath of a psychopathic mobster(n)

programme.title: Scandalize My Name: Stories from the Blacklist
programme.desc: A look at how black entertainers---including Paul Robeson, Hazel Scott and Canada Lee---were prevented from working during the McCarthy Era. Interviewed: Harry Belafonte, Ossie Davis, Rosetta LeNoire, Dick Campbell. With an introduction by Morgan Freeman. Directed by Alexandra Isles(n)

programme.title: Homer & Eddie
programme.desc: Buddy tale about a brain-damaged man and a homicidal mental patient on the road(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: When corrupt businessman Max catches thief Kevin robbing his house, he rubs a little salt in the wound, stealing the burglar's lucky ring as he's being arrested. Kevin is enraged and vows to have his revenge. But which one's the bigger crook?(n)

programme.title: Clean Slate
programme.desc: Dana Carvey is a private eye who wakes up every morning without a clue where, or who he is. It's like Memento, but with more belly laughs(n)

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: Young couple Chris and Lisa Mattson are terrorised by their new neighbour, racist cop Abel Turner(n)

programme.title: Kiss of Death
programme.desc: A former thief turned family man finds his efforts to go straight hampered by his underworld contacts. His cousin coerces him into taking one more job, but when things go wrong, the family face the attentions of the police and the wrath of a psychopathic mobster(n)

programme.title: Deliver Us From Eva
programme.desc: Three men discover that meddling in their sister-in-law's love life only makes their own lives more complicated in this romantic comedy. Eva Dandridge (Gabrielle Union) developed a sense of responsibility early on in life, when after the death of her parents she was left to care for her three younger sisters, Kareenah (Essence Atkins), Bethany (Robinne Lee), and Jacqui (Meagan Good). All four of the Dandridge sisters have grown up to be attractive, intelligent, and successful; Kareenah is happily married to Tim (Mel Jackson), while Bethany is engaged to Michael (Duane Martin), and Jacqui is going steady with Darrell (Dartanyan Edmonds). However, Eva still watches over her siblings like a hawk, and while her sisters love Eva dearly, Tim, Michael, and Darrell wish their sister-in-law would stay out of their business. The guys decide that if Eva had a boyfriend, she might be less interested in running other people's lives, and they turn to Ray (LL Cool J), a notorious ladies' man, for help. Ray is short on cash, so the guys make him a deal -- they'll give him 5,000 dollars to romance Eva, sweep her off her feet, and then dump her a few weeks later. Ray agrees, and while getting past her no-nonsense demeanor takes some doing, before long she's head over heels for him. However, Ray unexpectedly finds himself falling in love with Eva, and Eva, when offered a job in another town, decides to stay on to be with Ray. Even worse, the other Dandridge sisters are so impressed with the romantic Ray that they start demanding a bit more TLC from their own men(n)

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: Giovanni Ribisi is an intelligent college dropout who joins a small stock brokerage firm, where he soon becomes one of their top salesmen in the heated atmosphere of the 'boiler room' alongside Vin Diesel and Nicky Katt. But as he rises up the ladder, so he learns of the firm's illegal actions and tries to get his father, a judge, to help him. However, Rifkin refuses and, tapped by the Fbi, Ribisi has one chance to save innocents from fraud - he must testify against his company. Ben Younger's tough drama also stars Ben Affleck, Nia Long and Scott Caan(n)

programme.title: The Caveman's Valentine
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson wears several hats in this tense drama about a Juilliard-trained pianist who suffers from schizophrenia and lives in a cave. He suspects that a young homeless man's death was actually a murder, but can't get anyone to believe him. Ann Magnuson, Colm Feore, Aunjanue Ellis, Tamara Tunie, Jay Rodan, Anthony Michael Hall(n)

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: Young couple Chris and Lisa Mattson are terrorised by their new neighbour, racist cop Abel Turner(n)

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: XXXVI. A rescue plan may come between Flint and Silver; Max discovers the real price of freedom; Rackham tracks his prey; the Walrus sails into uncharted territory(n)

programme.title: Glitter
programme.desc: A woman overcomes a troubled childhood to become a singing sensation(n)

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Las Vegas
programme.desc: Stand-up comics perform at the Hard Rock Hotel in Las Vegas(n)

programme.title: Ride
programme.desc: A rag tag group of rap hopefuls is persuaded by record company executives to take a bus to Miami for a video shoot. Of course, this ride turns out to be anything but smooth. The funniest parts of this satire on the world of hip hop and rappers are the in-jokes and cameo appearances by famous names from the genre(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
programme.desc: In this continuation of the epic space opera, an ex-stormtrooper, a scrappy desert dweller and a droid companion embark on a journey that brings them face-to-face with heroes from the past, who are now battling a fascist regime called the First Order(n)

programme.title: Blood Out
programme.desc: A small town sheriff retires his badge to avenge his brother's murder, but finds himself tempted into the criminal lifestyle by a beautiful killer in this gritty crime thriller. Dejected when veteran detectives write off his brother's murder as gang related, Sheriff Michael Spencer (Luke Goss) decides to take the law into his own hands. Posing as a violent, tattooed gangster, he quickly works his way up through the criminal ranks. In the process, Michael begins to lose his own identity, eventually becoming romantically entangled with a ruthless temptress (AnnaLynne McCord), and ultimately facing off against the leader of a powerful criminal empire (Val Kilmer). Vinnie Jones and Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson co-star(n)

programme.title: 2 Days in New York
programme.desc: Marion has long since suppressed the catastrophic trip to Paris that ended her relationship with Jack and left her with an unexpected pregnancy. She now lives in a stylish loft in Manhattan with her new boyfriend Mingus, who's a popular radio talk show host. When two days are remaining until Marion's photo-exhibit her French family, consisting of her father, sister and sister's boyfriend (Marion's ex-boyfriend) comes to visit. All they bring with them, except for love of course, is chaos, sausages and a disdain for Americans(n)

programme.title: Biggie and Tupac
programme.desc: A no holds barred investigation into the still unsolved murders of two of the biggest superstars rap has ever produced; Christopher Wallace, aka Biggie Smalls, and Tupac Shakur(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: After losing his partner in an out of control bust, forensic psychologist Dr. Alex Cross (Morgan Freeman) stops working and cannot forgive himself. But he¿s drawn back to work when a brilliant but remorseless psychopath who has landed a teaching position at an exclusive private school in Washington, D.C. abducts one of his students, the daughter of a senator. Ollie MacArthur, the detective investigating the case, has strong words for Jezzie Flannigan, the Secret Service agent who mistakenly let Megan slip through her fingers. But Dr. Cross seeks out Flannigan, who he believes might have a valuable insight into the case. Soon, they both come to the terrible realization that this crime only represents the tip of the iceberg for the ruthless criminal(n)

programme.title: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: To secure a promotion from her boss, a savvy ad exec (Jennifer Aniston) pretends to be engaged to a stranger (Jay Mohr). Contrived, but harmless, romantic comedy from director and co-writer Glenn Gordon Caron, the man behind "Moonlighting."(n)

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Cassie is a high-school student leading a normal life, including a crush on a football star, when aliens invade Earth and kill millions of humans. Now, she must rescue her kidnapped brother while figuring out whom she can trust(n)

programme.title: Happily N'ever After 2: Snow White - Another Bite at the Apple
programme.desc: Teen princess Snow White is banished by the evil Lady Vain and must get help from the seven dwarves to win her kingdom back(n)

programme.title: Monsters, Inc.
programme.desc: The world of monsters is powered by kids' screams, but what happens when one little girl just can't be scared? Beastly duo Sully and Mike find out when a child follows them back through the closet to their own realm(n)

programme.title: Franny's Feet
programme.desc: Picture This; Sound Advice. Franny learns about hieroglyphics in Egypt. Later, she visits Scotland, where she learns about bagpipes and how sound travels(n)

programme.sub-title: The Cat and the Puppy; Where's the Food; Animals and Their Jobs
programme.desc: The Cat and the Puppy; Where's the Food; Animals and Their Jobs. On a picnic, a sneaky cat tricks Patch into giving up his cake(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington Bear
programme.sub-title: Paddington Turns Detective; Seeing Is Believing; A Visit to the Theatre
programme.desc: Paddington Turns Detective; Seeing Is Believing; A Visit to the Theatre. Paddington turns detective to investigate the disappearance of a prized vegetable; and to re-kindle a young Irish girl's imagination, Paddington poses as a leprechaun. Also: Paddington's first visit to the theatre is marked by a marmalade mishap(n)

programme.title: Sabrina, the Animated Series
programme.desc: Picture Perfect. Sabrina resorts to using magic to win an award for student of the year(n)

programme.title: Liberty's Kids
programme.desc: American Crisis. It's December 1776 and the American war effort is at its lowest point. "These are the times that try men's souls," writes Thomas Paine (voice of Nils Haaland). The kids see that when they meet General Washington (Cork Ramer). Voice of Ben Franklin: Walter Cronkite(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's 5th
programme.desc: The adventures of everyone's favourite St. Bernard continue in this fifth outing for the popular canine BEETHOVEN series. Here, when Beethoven digs up an old ten dollar bill, it arouses the suspicion of the Cedar Woods community. When the town finds out that the bill is part of a lost fortune, Beethoven becomes everyone's best friend as the entire town tries to get him to sniff out the loot(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Man
programme.desc: Hilary Duff stars in this comedy as Holly, a teenager whose lovelorn single mum moves the family including her youngest daughter to a new state every time she gets dumped, which is often. Their latest residence turns out to be Brooklyn, where the now thoroughly destabilised Holly decides that enough is enough and works to prevent mum from dating yet another local loser..(n)

programme.title: Monsters, Inc.
programme.desc: The world of monsters is powered by kids' screams, but what happens when one little girl just can't be scared? Beastly duo Sully and Mike find out when a child follows them back through the closet to their own realm(n)

programme.title: Larger than Life
programme.desc: Fun comic adventure with Bill Murray trying to get to grips with his big inheritance...a circus elephant!(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's 5th

programme.title: Beethoven's Big Break
programme.desc: Jonathan Silverman, Oscar Nunez, Cesar Millan, Rhea Perlman, and Eddie Griffin headline this installment of the popular film series featuring everyone's favorite fun-loving St. Bernard. Animal handler Eddie (Silverman) may deal with some of the best beasts in the business by day, but when it comes to his personal life there are no pets allowed. So strict is Eddie in enforcing this policy that when his young son Billy discovers a stray dog named Beethoven and his young litter of puppies, he insists that the boy find another place for the homeless pooches to live. But when dog-nappers make off with the canine star of the latest film that Eddie is working on, producers start to turn up the pressure for Eddie to find a replacement. Now, the harried father's only hope is to replace the missing canine with Beethoven, a natural star if there ever was one. Of course it doesn't take long for Beethoven to win Eddie's heart, and take Hollywood by storm, in the process proving that you can teach an old dog new tricks after all(n)

programme.title: Monsters, Inc.
programme.desc: The world of monsters is powered by kids' screams, but what happens when one little girl just can't be scared? Beastly duo Sully and Mike find out when a child follows them back through the closet to their own realm(n)

programme.title: Larger than Life

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: While out on a call, Roy Neary, a power repairman, witnesses' unidentified flying objects in the skies near his Muncie, Indiana home. This encounter sets into action a startling chain of dramatic events. Neary tries desperately to understand what he has experienced. He is baffled by the governmental cover-up that blocks his efforts, however, and finds himself increasingly driven to the emotional edge. His wife cannot understand what is happening and finds her relationship with her husband disintegrating. In his quest, Neary clings to an ally in Jillian Guiler, who has witnessed with him the nocturnal encounter. Together, they pursue an answer to the extraordinary mystery that has engulfed them. Richard Dreyfuss, Teri Garr and Melinda Dillon(n)

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Ti scavenges a toy for his small son, Dicky. It's a cute alien that Dicky hopes will help him ace his classes and punish the bullies who torment him. But rubbery, wide-eyed little CJ7 has other things in mind for his new human friend(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's Christmas Adventure
programme.desc: When a precocious elf crash-lands in the neighborhood of Beethoven, the talking St. Bernard, and a load full of presents are lost, it's up to Beethoven and his human pals to track down the goodies, help the elf and save Christmas(n)

programme.desc: Madeline and friends travel the world in song(n)

programme.desc: A small-town robot goes to the big city to be an inventor. An eye-popping computer-animated comedy(n)

programme.desc: Rainforest Games; Shake Those Beans. Franny learns about rain forests and travels to Mexico(n)

programme.sub-title: Going South for the Winter; Wally's Hat; Connie Hunts for Treasure
programme.desc: Going South for the Winter; Wally's Hat; Connie Hunts for Treasure. Connie hears about bird and insect friends planning to go south for the winter(n)

programme.sub-title: Paddington at the Wheel; Howdy Paddington; A Shopping Expedition
programme.desc: Paddington at the Wheel; Howdy Paddington; A Shopping Expedition. Paddington has his first driving test; the (not so) Wild West is the setting for Mr. Gruber to live out his boyhood dream of being a cowboy; and Paddington goes on a shopping expedition(n)

programme.title: Sabrina, the Animated Series
programme.desc: Field Trippin'. Sabrina needs money to buy tickets to the Bubblegum Girls concert, so she agrees to babysit two bratty children with Harvey. They all take a trip to the museum, but things get hairy when a little of Sabrina's magic traps them inside the paintings(n)

programme.title: Liberty's Kids
programme.desc: Across the Delaware. Sarah and James meet a British spy who turns out to be a double agent. Meanwhile, General Washington crosses the Delaware on Christmas 1776 and finally gets the victory he needs at Princeton, N.J. on Jan. 2, 1777. programme.title: The Wolfman
programme.desc: Universal Studios resurrects the classic lycanthrope with this tale of a man who experiences an unsettling transformation after he returns to his ancestral home in Victorian-era Great Britain and gets attacked by a rampaging werewolf. When Ben Talbot (Simon Merrells) vanishes into thin air, his brother Lawrence (Benicio Del Toro) returns to his family estate to investigate. Upon reuniting with his estranged father, Sir John Talbot (Anthony Hopkins), however, he discovers a destiny far darker than his blackest nightmares. Ben is dead; the victim of a savage attack by a beast that keeps the superstitious locals cowering in fear every time the moon shines bright in the sky. Shortly after discovering his brother's true fate, Lawrence swears to Ben's wife, Gwen (Emily Blunt), that he will bring her late husband's killer to justice. As a young boy, the untimely death of his mother caused Lawrence to grow up before his time. Though Lawrence had previously attempted to bury his pain in the past by leaving the quiet Victorian hamlet of Blackmoor behind, he discovers that you can't outrun fate when he's attacked by the very same nocturnal beast that claimed his brother. Not even recently arrived Scotland Yard inspector Aberline (Hugo Weaving) can dream up a rational explanation for the gruesome spell cast over Blackmoor, yet rumors of an ancient curse persist. According to legend, the afflicted will experience a horrific transformation by the light of the full moon. Now, the woman Talbot loves is in mortal danger, and in order to protect her he must venture into the moonlit woods and destroy the beast before it destroys her. But this isn't a typical hunt, because before the beast can be slain, a simple man will uncover a primal side of himself that he never knew existed. Screenwriter Andrew Kevin Walker pens a film directed by Joe Johnston and featuring creature effects by special-effects makeup legend Rick Baker(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Future in the Past. programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Muse to My Ears. The Charmed Ones discover that a band of rogue warlocks is capturing and enslaving the Muses. The sinister plan is to use the Muses' divine creative talents (singing, acting, writing, etc.) to create a new demonic faction in the absence of The Source of All Evil. Hoping to prevent this, Piper (Holly Marie Combs), Phoebe (Alyssa Milano), and Paige (Rose McGowan) must themselves risk permanent imprisonment to rescue the Muses and vanquish the warlocks. Meanwhile, Cole (Julian McMahon) is put out over Phoebe's reluctance to make a commitment, and he begins to wonder if giving up his demonic powers was such a hot idea after all(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The But in the Joke. Meanwhile, Booth takes a stab at stand-up comedy at a club's open-mike night to look for suspects; and Angela finds herself attracted to the street artist(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Ghost in the Machine. A psychic joins the investigation of the death of a little boy whose soul is believed to be still alive, prompting the team members to reflect on their beliefs of life after death(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Diamond in the Rough. When a professional ballroom dancer is killed before her audition for a reality-TV dance competition, Brennan and Booth pose as potential contestants to hunt for suspects(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Archaeologist in the Cocoon. An archaeologist with a dubious reputation is murdered soon after making an important discovery(n)

programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: When humans look like losing the war against giant aliens from beneath the sea, Commander Stacker Pentecost sends two misfit fighters out to man the massive American robot that stands between life and total annihilation. Joining forces with bots from across the globe, Raleigh Becket and Mako Mori face the aliens head-on in a crushing fight to the death(n)

programme.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
programme.desc: This family adventure from Chris Columbus (who directed the first two Harry Potter films) is adapted from the first of Rick Riordan's series of fantasy novels, and stars Logan Lerman as Percy Jackson, an American teen who finds that Greek myth is much closer to home than he imagined. It turns out that while his mum Sally is human, his father is Poseidon, the Greek god of the sea and earthquakes; which makes our hero a demigod. At first it's all a bit much to take in, as he learns the modern world is teeming with deities and their offspring. And things take a turn for the worse when Zeus suspects Percy of theft, after the lightning bolt that confers supreme terrifying power goes missing. With his mother kidnapped and the errant super weapon threatening to cause a catastrophic clash of the titans among the gods, Percy sets off to recover the artefact. As he does so, he discovers the many creatures and monsters of legend are also alive today, and are as fierce as ever. Also starring Pierce Brosnan as a centaur, Uma Thurman as Medusa and Steve Coogan as Hades(n)
